name: Marqués de Riscal Rioja Reserva 2015
wine_description: Cherry-red colour with good robe. Spicy, balsamic aromas of great complexity, with notes of ripe dark berries and light toasted nuances. On the palate it is full and tasty, with good structure and rounded, elegant tannins. The finish is long and fresh, with a slight reminder of the fine oak.

name: Catena Malbec 2017
wine_description: Dark violet color with deep bluish – black tones. The nose offers ripe, concentrated dark fruit aromas with delicate floral notes and traces of vanilla and mocha. The mouthfeel is rich and lush, with concentrated black cherry and red currant fruit flavors layered with sweet spices, tobacco and a touch of leather.

name: Opus One Overture N.V.
wine_description: Overture blends five traditional Bordeaux grape varieties and captures the terroir characteristics of each variety grown in different soils. Overture’s third blending aspect – that of marrying multiple vintages – yields a softer, rounder expression than Opus One estate that can be enjoyed upon release.

name: E. Guigal Côtes-du-Rhône Rouge 2015
wine_description: Deep and dark red. Shiny. Fresh fruits with red berries and spices. Full, round and racy. Rounded and smooth tannins. A full-bodied, rich and intensly aromatic wine. Full with a long finish and plenty of elegance and finesse due to the well balanced tannins and fruit.

name: Mouton Cadet Bordeaux Rouge 2016
wine_description: An intense, ruby red colour with purple highlights. The wine has a rich, open nose with attractive aromas of red berry fruit (raspberry, cherry) and strawberry jam accompanied by a touch of menthol. Round and full on the palate, it displays fine balance with an elegant tannic structure and a pleasant range of crisp, fruity flavours enhanced by a touch of liquorice.

name: Antinori Villa Antinori Rosso 2014
wine_description: Marchesi Antinori’s passion for viticulture is expressed through perseverance: their continuous pursuit for quality improvement, even in the smallest details. Research and development is an ongoing process both in the vineyards and in the cellars: selecting new clones of local and international varieties: experimenting with new techniques in the vineyards and vineyard altitudes, new approaches to fermentation and temperature control, experimenting with both traditional and innovative winemaking philosophies, using new types of oak for barrels, barrel size and age, and varying length of aging in the bottle before commercial release.

name: Trivento Reserve Malbec 2018
wine_description:
Colour: Bright carmine red. 
Aromas: plum and raspberry aroma mingle elegantly with vanilla notes from the oak. 
Palate: well balanced, exhibits sweet tannins and a velvety finish.

name: Stag's Leap Wine Cellars ARTEMIS Cabernet Sauvignon 2016
wine_description:
The heart of Stag’s Leap Wine Cellars is undoubtedly the estate vineyards and extraordinary care is taken to assure that a wine’s aroma, flavor, and texture convey a sense of place. As the difference between a good wine and a great one is often in the details, our viticultural practices are driven by extreme, even obsessive, attention to detail. Throughout the growing season and all the way through harvest, vines are cared for to achieve their optimum maturity level and ensure the ‘signature’ of the terroir is expressed to its fullest.

The goal is to create wines of classic beauty — wines with balance, complexity and harmony.

From the beginning, the Stag’s Leap Wine Cellars vision has been to create wines that speak to the place from which they come. These goals are realized in our three limited-production Estate-Grown Cabernet Sauvignons – CASK 23, S.L.V. and FAY—which are crafted from vineyards surrounding the winery.

The same classic style of the Estate wines is also expressed in the Napa Valley Collection, which consists of three wines: AVETA Sauvignon Blanc; KARIA Chardonnay and ARTEMIS Cabernet Sauvignon.

name: Emilio Moro Tinto 2015
wine_description: Cherry color, and it offers a great variety of sensations. On the mouth it’s intense and mouth-watering. On the nose, its richness and variety of aromas stand out: wood, black fruits and vanilla.

name: Casa Ferreirinha Esteva Douro 2015
wine_description:
Bright red ruby hue. Its bouquet is dominated by lively red fruit (strawberry and cherry), as well
as by balmy notes (cedar and tobacco) and hints of chocolate candy and a floral component of rock-rose. Its complexity arises both from the careful selection of blends from Douro recommended vine varieties and from its evolution in the bottle.

name: Ornellaia Le Volte 2015
wine_description: The 2014 vintage was the most challenging in our memory, but has nevertheless enabled us to produce high quality wines that give immense pleasure. The late ripening of the grapes have made it possible to express the crispness and freshness of the fruit to best effect. What is striking is the high quality of the tannins on the palate: silky, refined and without any sharp edges, albeit with a lower density than in hotter vintages. Le Volte dell’Ornellaia is a balanced, harmonious and very drinkable wine thanks in particular to the beautiful Merlots of 2014.

name: Cloudy Bay Sauvignon Blanc 2016
wine_description: Scented and summery, the Cloudy Bay Sauvignon Blanc has deliciously vibrant aromatics that infuse the tropical fragrance of fresh passion fruit and juicy pineapples with garden-fresh basil and the spiciness of crushed tomato leaves. The palate is long and succulent, combining exotic fruits with ripe, red capsicum and a twist of green olive beautifully complemented by crisp natural acidity and a hint of lime zest.

name: Masi Costasera Amarone della Valpolicella Classico 2013
wine_description: Deep ruby ​​red. Stewed fruit, plum and cherry to the nose. Fruity aromas with notes of coffee and cocoa. Extremely balanced.

name: Antinori Pèppoli Chianti Classico 2016
wine_description: Marchesi Antinori’s passion for viticulture is expressed through perseverance: their continuous pursuit for quality improvement, even in the smallest details. Research and development is an ongoing process both in the vineyards and in the cellars: selecting new clones of local and international varieties: experimenting with new techniques in the vineyards and vineyard altitudes, new approaches to fermentation and temperature control, experimenting with both traditional and innovative winemaking philosophies, using new types of oak for barrels, barrel size and age, and varying length of aging in the bottle before commercial release.

name: Alión Ribera del Duero 2014
wine_description: It appears with hints of roast from the grape and top-quality wood. On the palate, the sweetened tannins of the concentrated black fruits blend with the dry creamy tannins of the French oak. It is full of flavor, strong, fleshy and unfolds a truly suggestive range of tastes.

name: Penfolds Koonunga Hill Shiraz - Cabernet 2017
wine_description: Color: bright crimson red. Nose: A youthful koonunga hill disposition arises. dark sour-cherry, blackberry, rhubarb fruits abound. aromas of malt/oats/wheat germ with a green olive and pomegranate alert. integrated, supportive oak awoken. Palate: compact, defined. pomegranate/plum/dark berry fruits. a white chocolate mousse/creamy dairy chocolate flavour/texture amalgam. on the finish, a charry/smokey impression (oak ?).

name: Clos de los Siete Clos de Los Siete (by Michel Rolland) 2016
wine_name: Clos de Los Siete (by Michel Rolland)
wine_description: On the nose, C7’s intense and complex aromatic expression delivers subtle notes of fruit and spice. On the palate, the delicate tannins are ripe and silky, and combine with appealing freshness. Well-balanced in structure, full-bodied and offering typical freshness, the wine showcases the charming, elegant style.

name: Tommasi Amarone della Valpolicella Classico 2015
wine_description: Deep ruby red color with garnet shades. Warm, ripe on the nose, intense and of great refinement. The taste is complex, smooth, full bodied, lots of cherry notes and plum.

name: Torres Viña Esmeralda 2018
wine_description:
Fragrant and floral (lime blossom, acacia honey) with notes of fresh fruit (Muscat grape, citrus)
and tropical passion fruit. Sensual and silky on the palate, framed by seductive, delicate acidity
(pink grapefruit).

name: Marqués de Murrieta Reserva Rioja (Finca Ygay) 2015
wine_description: Ripe fruit with a perfect balance of acidity, supple roundness on the palate and a hint of new oak. It exhibits a dense, bright cherry color. Appealing, big and spicy nose. Outstanding aromatic cherry and red fruit, mineral smoke and subtle oak notes. On the palace it reveals fleshy fruit, silky tannins, and subtle, spicy oak. Beautiful texture and balance.

name: Antinori Villa Antinori Chianti Classico Riserva 2015
wine_description: Marchesi Antinori’s passion for viticulture is expressed through perseverance: their continuous pursuit for quality improvement, even in the smallest details. Research and development is an ongoing process both in the vineyards and in the cellars: selecting new clones of local and international varieties: experimenting with new techniques in the vineyards and vineyard altitudes, new approaches to fermentation and temperature control, experimenting with both traditional and innovative winemaking philosophies, using new types of oak for barrels, barrel size and age, and varying length of aging in the bottle before commercial release.

name: La Rioja Alta Viña Ardanza Selección Especial 2010
wine_description: Outstanding dark-cherry red; intense, bright and clean. The first impression on the nose is of great freshness provided by notes of cherries and blackcurrants knit with notes of black pepper, tobacco, nutmeg, coffee, caramel and vanilla from barrel ageing. Tasty, with a soft freshness, nice structure, balanced acidity and fine, elegant tannins. Silky finish, with a lovely aftertaste, where liqueur-like notes of blackcurrants intermingle with toasty notes and sweet spices.

name: Antinori Tenuta Tignanello 'Marchese Antinori' Chianti Classico Riserva 2015
wine_name: Tenuta Tignanello 'Marchese Antinori' Chianti Classico Riserva
wine_description: Marchesi Antinori’s passion for viticulture is expressed through perseverance: their continuous pursuit for quality improvement, even in the smallest details. Research and development is an ongoing process both in the vineyards and in the cellars: selecting new clones of local and international varieties: experimenting with new techniques in the vineyards and vineyard altitudes, new approaches to fermentation and temperature control, experimenting with both traditional and innovative winemaking philosophies, using new types of oak for barrels, barrel size and age, and varying length of aging in the bottle before commercial release.

name: Ornellaia Le Serre Nuove 2013
wine_description: Deeply colored, it presents warm red berry fruit, coca, and spice aromas. On the palate it's ample and round, with perfectly ripe, well polished tannins and rich fruit supported by perfectly balanced acidity.

name: Emilio Moro Malleolus 2015
wine_description: Color ripe cherry, background covered with thin layer garnet rim. The nose is a very intense black fruit wine which dominates jam, balsamic and aromatic woods. Equally stand spicy aromas of cloves and coffee, clay minerals touches. The palate is powerful and concentrated great balance. Retronasal appear again spicy, black fruit and aromatic woods. The palate is velvety and excellent integration between fruit and wood.

name: Torres Gran Coronas Reserva Cabernet Sauvignon 2014
wine_description: Opaque cherry red wine. Fruity (jammy strawberry and raspberry) with lovely spicy (black pepper) and balsamic notes. Intense, deep, with very ripe, velvety tannins from aging in wood (toasted oak).

name: Marqués de Riscal Blanco (Verdejo) 2018
wine_description: A bright, straw-yellow coloured wine. On the nose it has high aromatic intensity with tropical fruit and hints of fennel and fresh grass. In the mouth it is both syrupy smooth and refreshing, with a slightly bitter finish which is typical of the variety making it long and pleasant to drink. Overall it is a fresh, well-balanced wine.

name: Marqués de Riscal Blanco (Verdejo) 2016
wine_description: A bright, straw-yellow coloured wine. On the nose it has high aromatic intensity with tropical fruit and hints of fennel and fresh grass. In the mouth it is both syrupy smooth and refreshing, with a slightly bitter finish which is typical of the variety making it long and pleasant to drink. Overall it is a fresh, well-balanced wine.

wine_description: Marchesi Antinori’s passion for viticulture is expressed through perseverance: their continuous pursuit for quality improvement, even in the smallest details. wine_name: Tenuta Tignanello 'Marchese Antinori' Chianti Classico Riserva

name: Fattoria dei Barbi Brunello di Montalcino 2012
wine_description: A lively rich ruby announces an equally appealing complexity in the bouquet, which has the classic essences of red berries, complemented by delicate nuances of oak and liquorice. On the palate this wine is warm and ample; showing a well integrated balance of tannins and acidity, a great structure and long, persistent finish.

name: E. Guigal Côtes-du-Rhône Rouge 2016
wine_description: Deep and dark red. Shiny. Fresh fruits with red berries and spices. Full, round and racy. Rounded and smooth tannins. A full-bodied, rich and intensly aromatic wine. Full with a long finish and plenty of elegance and finesse due to the well balanced tannins and fruit.

name: Muga Reserva 2015
wine_description: It has a fresh mouth-feel, almost giving the impression of having mentholated nuances, with a presence of acidic fruit liqueur. It can seem quite a strange combination. In the retronasal phase it is totally spicy and leaves new hints of liqueur fruit at a second level, but this time much more complex in character.

name: Cantina Zaccagnini Montepulciano d'Abruzzo (Il Vino dal Tralcetto Riserva) 2017
wine_name: Montepulciano d'Abruzzo (Il Vino dal Tralcetto Riserva)
wine_description:
It has intense ruby red colour with violet nuances; intense, characteristic bouquet of the primary
grape aromas; fruity component, full-bodied and robust, well-balanced with tannin and oak features.

name: Ogier Clos de l'Oratoire des Papes Châteauneuf-du-Pape 2016
wine_name: Clos de l'Oratoire des Papes Châteauneuf-du-Pape

name: Banfi Brunello di Montalcino 2014
wine_description:
Colour: intense ruby red with garnet reflections.
Bouquet: ethereal, wide, light vanilla.
Taste: full, soft, velvety and intense, with sensations of liquorice, spices and light
goudron note.

name: Torres Sangre de Toro 2017
wine_description: Deep ruby colour with a hint of ochre. Rich complex Mediterranean aromas with exuberant notes of spices and blackberries. Velvety tannins are noted on the palate with elegant flavours of liquorice and small dark forest fruits

name: Ornellaia Le Serre Nuove 2014
wine_description: Deeply colored, it presents warm red berry fruit, coca, and spice aromas. On the palate it's ample and round, with perfectly ripe, well polished tannins and rich fruit supported by perfectly balanced acidity.

name: Protos Crianza 2014
wine_description: Aged 14 months in French and American barrels, and another 12 months in bottle; this wine comes from over 40 year old vineyards spread over different parts of Ribera del Duero, creating a perfect blend of different aromas and tastes.

name: Antinori Pèppoli Chianti Classico 2017
wine_description: Marchesi Antinori’s passion for viticulture is expressed through perseverance: their continuous pursuit for quality improvement, even in the smallest details. name: Aalto PS (Pagos Seleccionados) Ribera del Duero 2016
wine_description: Very intense purple colour. Aromas of liquorice, tobacco, noble woods, spices, pain grillé and black berries. In the mouth, this wine offers density and structure, with plenty of silky tannins that provide finesse and elegance. Acidity and alcohol balance each other in a harmonious and lengthy wine.

name: Ornellaia Le Serre Nuove 2012
wine_description: Deeply colored, it presents warm red berry fruit, coca, and spice aromas. On the palate it's ample and round, with perfectly ripe, well polished tannins and rich fruit supported by perfectly balanced acidity.

name: Cloudy Bay Sauvignon Blanc 2019
wine_description: Scented and summery, the Cloudy Bay Sauvignon Blanc has deliciously vibrant aromatics that infuse the tropical fragrance of fresh passion fruit and juicy pineapples with garden-fresh basil and the spiciness of crushed tomato leaves. The palate is long and succulent, combining exotic fruits with ripe, red capsicum and a twist of green olive beautifully complemented by crisp natural acidity and a hint of lime zest.

name: Almaviva Almaviva 2012
wine_description: Deep, intense, ruby red color with purple tones. Aromas of cassis, black berries and violet, notes of vanilla, cacao, licorice, and spices.

name: Almaviva Almaviva 2013
wine_description: Deep, intense, ruby red color with purple tones. Aromas of cassis, black berries and violet, notes of vanilla, cacao, licorice, and spices.

name: Almaviva Almaviva 2011
wine_description: Deep, intense, ruby red color with purple tones. Aromas of cassis, black berries and violet, notes of vanilla, cacao, licorice, and spices.

name: Casillero del Diablo Chardonnay (Reserva) 2018
wine_description: Pale greenish yellow with golden and bright hints. Fresh, shows the fruity character from the beginning. Pineapple and peach together with small touches of hazelnut. Wine with good structure, an excellent balance, fresh and lively acidity. Medium bodied with a long and dry end palate. At the end you find green pear and delicate hints of white peach with toast.

name: Allegrini Amarone della Valpolicella Classico 2013
wine_description: The result of the Allegrini family’s expertise, a true classic of the appellation, this red wine embraces tradition, territory and the know-how of country ways. Corvina, Corvinone, Rondinella and Oseleta are left to air dry at least until December and are checked daily to ensure perfectly healthy grapes.

name: Silver Oak Napa Valley Cabernet Sauvignon 2014
wine_description: It has a ripe, rich, layered, yet elegant wine. It has a dark, ruby color and a complex nose of cassis jam, mocha, violets and nutmeg.

name: Altos Ibéricos Crianza 2016
wine_description: Opaque cherry red color. Floral (Damascus rose) and fruit (strawberry, raspberry) aromas with spicy and smoky notes imparted by oak aging. Velvety, smooth, with fine, juicy tannins.

name: Alión Ribera del Duero 2015
wine_description: It appears with hints of roast from the grape and top-quality wood. On the palate, the sweetened tannins of the concentrated black fruits blend with the dry creamy tannins of the French oak. It is full of flavor, strong, fleshy and unfolds a truly suggestive range of tastes.

name: Marqués de Riscal Rioja Gran Reserva 2007
wine_description: Deep black-cherry colour, almost opaque. Very elegant, complex nose, with aromas of black fruit and lots of spice. It is smooth and round in the mouth, with tannins which are firm, yet silky and very sweet and which envelop the whole palate. The finish is long, lingering, fresh and balanced  with a hint of fine elegant tannins.

name: Ornellaia Bolgheri Superiore 2014
wine_description: With its dense, vibrant colour, it has a nose of splendid aromatic complexity built around a limpid and brilliant fruitiness, underscored by refined spicy and balsamic notes. The mouth develops vibrant and complex fruity nuances framed by a dense, slender structure with tannins that attain a rare harmony between firmness and fleshiness, concluding with a long balanced and fresh finish.

name: Mauro Red 2011
wine_description: Aromatic profile in the house style with clean, ripe and expressive fruit. Opulence and silkiness go hand in hand in a dense, plush, rounded palate.

name: Antinori Tenuta Guado al Tasso Il Bruciato Bolgheri 2018
wine_name: Tenuta Guado al Tasso Il Bruciato Bolgheri
wine_description: Marchesi Antinori’s passion for viticulture is expressed through perseverance: their continuous pursuit for quality improvement, even in the smallest details. name: Produttori del Barbaresco Barbaresco 2013
wine_description: This wine shows a mentholated cherry nose followed by spicy, smoky black cherry and floral notes on the slowly unfolding palate.

name: Torres Salmos 2015
wine_description:
Dark ruby red. Rich, ripe wine with floral (confected rose) and fruit (dark cherries, prunes)
aromas. Beautifully framed by French oak. Elegant, subtle mid palate, very finely structured
tannins and a slight touch of toast (cocoa).

name: Cesari Amarone della Valpolicella Classico 2012
wine_description: Typical aromas of ripe fruit, fruit preserve and cherry are immediately perceived on first olfactory examination. Particularly striking is the incredible long length that lingerson the palate, when the wine displays all its strength through a warm an elegant body.

name: Luce della Vite Lucente 2016
wine_description: The nose is just as impressive, presenting a broad range of elegant aromatic impressions. Smooth, ripe scents of dried plum and blackberry preserves are easily noted, along with more pungent roasted espresso bean and baker’s chocolate, and subtle notes of green pepper.

name: Antinori Villa Antinori Rosso 2016
wine_description: Marchesi Antinori’s passion for viticulture is expressed through perseverance: their continuous pursuit for quality improvement, even in the smallest details. Research and development is an ongoing process both in the vineyards and in the cellars: selecting new clones of local and international varieties: experimenting with new techniques in the vineyards and vineyard altitudes, new approaches to fermentation and temperature control, experimenting with both traditional and innovative winemaking philosophies, using new types of oak for barrels, barrel size and age, and varying length of aging in the bottle before commercial release.

name: Antinori Tenuta Guado al Tasso Bolgheri Superiore 2013
wine_name: Tenuta Guado al Tasso Bolgheri Superiore

name: Almaviva Almaviva 2014
wine_description: Deep, intense, ruby red color with purple tones. Aromas of cassis, black berries and violet, notes of vanilla, cacao, licorice, and spices.

name: Famille Perrin Côtes-du-Rhône Réserve Rouge 2017
wine_description: Deep ruby color with beautiful purple highlights. Still lactic strand, the nose shows  's intense aromas of candied red fruit. Soft, round structured freshness.

name: Antinori Badia a Passignano Gran Selezione Chianti Classico 2012
wine_name: Badia a Passignano Gran Selezione Chianti Classico
wine_description: Marchesi Antinori’s passion for viticulture is expressed through perseverance: their continuous pursuit for quality improvement, even in the smallest details. Research and development is an ongoing process both in the vineyards and in the cellars: selecting new clones of local and international varieties: experimenting with new techniques in the vineyards and vineyard altitudes, new approaches to fermentation and temperature control, experimenting with both traditional and innovative winemaking philosophies, using new types of oak for barrels, barrel size and age, and varying length of aging in the bottle before commercial release. To succeed at best expressing what a vineyard, grape, and a winemaker can achieve requires constant trial and error, both in the vineyard and in the winery. At Marchesi Antinori, these experiments include a wide range of different grape varieties and clones, planted in a variety of vineyards, different styles and sizes of fermentors as well as techniques of fermentation; barrel types and sizes; length of barrel and bottle aging.

The mouth develops vibrant and complex fruity nuances framed by a dense, slender structure with tannins that attain a rare harmony between firmness and fleshiness, concluding with a long balanced and fresh finish.

name: Ricasoli Brolio Chianti Classico 2016
wine_description: Brolio successfully matches the superior drinkability that defines Chianti Classico in its young version with a full, complex structure, which makes this wine excellent in its category.

name: R. López de Heredia Viña Tondonia Viña Tondonia Reserva 2007
wine_description: Vibrant red leading slightly towards amber. Light fresh texture with notes of vanilla and dried berry aromas. Rich, very dry, smooth, developed. Firm tannins and balance.

name: Protos Reserva 2012
wine_description: This elegant wine comes from 50 year old vineyards from the Burgos region of Ribera del Duero. With 18 months of mostly French barrels and another 18 months in bottle, it delivers a perfect blend of ripe fruits and wood flavors.

name: Brancaia Tre 2014
wine_description: Brancaia Tre is a blend of 80% Sangiovese and 20% Merlot and Cabernet Sauvignon. It has fresh cranberry-cherry floral fruit nose flecked with liquorice and tobacco.

name: Antinori Badia a Passignano Gran Selezione Chianti Classico 2011

name: M. Chapoutier Les Vignes de Bila-Haut Côtes du Roussillon Villages 2017
wine_name: Les Vignes de Bila-Haut Côtes du Roussillon Villages
wine_description: Colour: deep red garnet. Nose: black cherries. Mouth: well-structured with sweet meaty tannins. The wine had the heat and wildness of the Roussillon area.

name: Torres Salmos 2014
wine_description:
Dark ruby red. Rich, ripe wine with floral (confected rose) and fruit (dark cherries, prunes)

In the mouth, this wine offers density and structure, with plenty of silky tannins that provide finesse and elegance. Acidity and alcohol balance each other in a harmonious and lengthy wine.

name: Penfolds Bin 389 Cabernet - Shiraz 2015
wine_description: Bright, deep-red, with an impenetrable core. Fresh mulberry/blueberry/ blackberry fruits laced with soy & malt, and slices of fresh fig & dates. A sweet middle meshed with tea-leaf/olive tapenade flavours. Rounded, ripe and lush tannins and integrated spicy oak usher in the finish.

name: Joseph Phelps Cabernet Sauvignon 2016
wine_description: Aromatics of plum, cherry, currants, coffee, cocoa and hints of allspice, fresh thyme, tobacco and forest floor. The body is laced with integrated tannins, great freshness and red fruit characteristics.

name: Penfolds Bin 28 Kalimna Shiraz 2016
wine_description: The nose is complex and beguiling, with notes of demi-glace and roasting pan juices, beneath scents of pipe tobacco, vanilla and pencil shavings oak - much more than just a simple varietal offering. The palate is full-bodied, refined and taut showing dark, black conserve fruit flavours.Liqueur chocolate and spice flavours are impregnated by overt, chewy and ripe tannins.

name: La Braccesca Vino Nobile di Montepulciano 2016
wine_description: The wine is bright ruby red with vibrant aromas of vanilla and ripe fruit. A generous and vibrant flavour with nice mineral hints typical of the zone. Soft, balanced tannins.

name: Château Pontet-Canet Pauillac (Grand Cru Classé) 2004
wine_description: Very intense colour. Very intense nose, marked by notes of cherry, blackberry and redcurrant with traces of vanilla, liquorice and cedar. The attack is full to the palate. The tannins of great smoothness reveal a fine elegance. The finish, with no trace of aggressiveness, is marked by a good length.

name: Ornellaia Bolgheri Superiore 2013
wine_description: With its dense, vibrant colour, it has a nose of splendid aromatic complexity built around a limpid and brilliant fruitiness, underscored by refined spicy and balsamic notes. The mouth develops vibrant and complex fruity nuances framed by a dense, slender structure with tannins that attain a rare harmony between firmness and fleshiness, concluding with a long balanced and fresh finish.

name: Trimbach Riesling Alsace 2016
wine_description: The Trimbach Family picks the Riesling grapes as late as possible in order to achieve maximum ripeness which, in turn, gives optimum depth of flavour and complexity.

name: Antinori Badia a Passignano Gran Selezione Chianti Classico 2010
wine_name: Badia a Passignano Gran Selezione Chianti Classico
wine_description: Marchesi Antinori’s passion for viticulture is expressed through perseverance: their continuous pursuit for quality improvement, even in the smallest details. Research and development is an ongoing process both in the vineyards and in the cellars: selecting new clones of local and international varieties: experimenting with new techniques in the vineyards and vineyard altitudes, new approaches to fermentation and temperature control, experimenting with both traditional and innovative winemaking philosophies, using new types of oak for barrels, barrel size and age, and varying length of aging in the bottle before commercial release. To succeed at best expressing what a vineyard, grape, and a winemaker can achieve requires constant trial and error, both in the vineyard and in the winery. At Marchesi Antinori, these experiments include a wide range of different grape varieties and clones, planted in a variety of vineyards, different styles and sizes of fermentors as well as techniques of fermentation; barrel types and sizes; length of barrel and bottle aging.

name: Álvaro Palacios Camins del Priorat 2018
wine_description: Offers full-bodied with rich, deeply concentrated black fruit flavors. Dark spices on the finish with some anise. Great for hearty meat dishes.

name: Château d'Armailhac Pauillac (Grand Cru Classé) 2010
wine_description: A dense and deep red with a violet tint, the wine has a still slightly reserved nose which opens with airing on hints of cassis, blackberry and fresh red fruit mingled with touches of cedarwood. The attack is nicely rounded, with well-integrated tannins that fill out on a mid-palate full of fruit. The flavours linger pleasingly in a full and expressive finish that gives the wine a fine overall balance.

name: Col d'Orcia Brunello di Montalcino 2014
wine_description: This wine has shows a ruby colour with violet hues. It is an highly structured wine, full and persistent. The ripe soft tannins are perfectly balanced with the acidity, long pleasant and sapid aftertaste.

name: Famille Perrin Châteauneuf-du-Pape Les Sinards Rouge 2017
wine_description: Dress a beautiful deep ruby.Intense black and red fruits, spices and pepper.Soft and fresh with fine tannins and tight with a nice finish on cherry.

name: M. Chapoutier Belleruche Côtes-du-Rhône 2014
wine_description: Colour: Garnet red. Nose: Red fruit aromas, mainly Morello cherries. Mouth: aromas of red fruits (mainly morello cherries) and spices (liquorice, grey pepper).

name: Almaviva Almaviva 2015
wine_description: Deep, intense, ruby red color with purple tones. Aromas of cassis, black berries and violet, notes of vanilla, cacao, licorice, and spices.

name: Château d'Armailhac Pauillac (Grand Cru Classé) 2012
wine_description: A dense and deep red with a violet tint, the wine has a still slightly reserved nose which opens with airing on hints of cassis, blackberry and fresh red fruit mingled with touches of cedarwood. The attack is nicely rounded, with well-integrated tannins that fill out on a mid-palate full of fruit. The flavours linger pleasingly in a full and expressive finish that gives the wine a fine overall balance.

name: Antinori Tenuta Tignanello 'Marchese Antinori' Chianti Classico Riserva 2012
wine_name: Tenuta Tignanello 'Marchese Antinori' Chianti Classico Riserva
wine_description: Marchesi Antinori’s passion for viticulture is expressed through perseverance: their continuous pursuit for quality improvement, even in the smallest details. Research and development is an ongoing process both in the vineyards and in the cellars: selecting new clones of local and international varieties: experimenting with new techniques in the vineyards and vineyard altitudes, new approaches to fermentation and temperature control, experimenting with both traditional and innovative winemaking philosophies, using new types of oak for barrels, barrel size and age, and varying length of aging in the bottle before commercial release.

name: Izadi Crianza 2016
wine_description: Shiny rub colour. Rich aromatic intensity with a nice balance of red fruit, liquorice and spices and smoked hints in the background. Elegant and round in the palate with a long afterstate that brings back floral and fruity memories

name: Clarendelle Bordeaux 2012
wine_description: The wine has a brilliant, intense red colour. The nose is redolent of black fruit (Burlat cherry, plum) and beautiful floral aromas. These fruity flavours carry over to the palate, which also features peppery and spicy notes. The wine has an elegant, fine-grained tannic structure.

name: Torres Mas La Plana Cabernet Sauvignon 2013
Allegrini Amarone della Valpolicella Classico 2012
wine_description: The result of the Allegrini family’s expertise, a true classic of the appellation, this red wine embraces tradition, territory and the know-how of country ways. Corvina, Corvinone, Rondinella and Oseleta are left to air dry at least until December and are checked daily to ensure perfectly healthy grapes.

name: Feudi di San Gregorio Taurasi 2012
wine_description:
Bright ruby red with garnet, fragrant scents of sour cherry and cherry, cinnamon
and nutmeg, vanilla and anise. The taste is full and balanced with soft, sweet tannins
which give a good persistence aromatic.

name: Gaja Sito Moresco Langhe 2015
wine_description: Pure nose with aromas of small fruits. Very elegant and balanced body. The finish is fresh, with fine tannins.

name: Château Pontet-Canet Pauillac (Grand Cru Classé) 2007
wine_description: Very intense colour. Very intense nose, marked by notes of cherry, blackberry and redcurrant with traces of vanilla, liquorice and cedar. The attack is full to the palate. The tannins of great smoothness reveal a fine elegance. The finish, with no trace of aggressiveness, is marked by a good length.

name: Escudo Rojo Gran Reserva 2017
wine_description: The wine has a lovely colour, dense and deep with a slight ruby tint, and a full, generous nose that reveals attractive blackcurrant, liquorice and cherry brandy aromas with spicier touches of nutmeg.  Round and rich on the palate, its chocolate, vanilla, caramel and pepper notes are underpinned by a stylish tannic structure, powerful but restrained.  The long, full-bodied and expressive finish combines tannins refined by the maturing process with delicious and persistent fruit and roasted coffee flavours.

name: Penfolds Bin 389 Cabernet - Shiraz 2016
wine_description: Bright, deep-red, with an impenetrable core. Fresh mulberry/blueberry/ blackberry fruits laced with soy & malt, and slices of fresh fig & dates. A sweet middle meshed with tea-leaf/olive tapenade flavours. Rounded, ripe and lush tannins and integrated spicy oak usher in the finish.

name: Famille Perrin Côtes-du-Rhône Réserve Rouge 2016
wine_description: Deep ruby color with beautiful purple highlights. Still lactic strand, the nose shows  's intense aromas of candied red fruit. Soft, round structured freshness.

name: Au Bon Climat Pinot Noir Santa Barbara County 2017
wine_description: Aromas and flavors of strawberries and raspberries are joined by anise and clove notes with mouth filling intensity.

name: Antinori Tenuta Guado al Tasso Bolgheri Superiore 2012
wine_name: Tenuta Guado al Tasso Bolgheri Superiore

name: Prunotto Barolo 2010
wine_description: Garnet red in color with ample and complex aromas of violets and berry fruit, full and velvety in flavour and very balanced.

name: Château Cantemerle Haut-Médoc (Grand Cru Classé) 2010
wine_description: Attractive aromas of pepper and licorice, evolving towards red fruit after agitation. The palate shows a harmonious marriage of charm and firmness based on soft, ripe, and very smooth tannins.

name: Le Macchiole Bolgheri Rosso 2016
wine_description: Intense ruby color with violet reflections. Spicy notes of green pepper and vanilla, small red fruits very intense and persistent. It's an elegant wine, well balanced. Tannins give a long fresh sensation, with a sweet closing.

name: Château Pichon Longueville Comtesse de Lalande Pauillac (Grand Cru Classé) 2005
wine_description: The wine is seductive when young without prejudicing its longevity. As well as an oaky flavour imparted by new oak barrels, the wines show inimitable aromas of tobacco, violets, blackcurrant and ripe fruit, and also hints of pencil lead.

name: Beaulieu Vineyard (BV) Napa Valley Cabernet Sauvignon 2016
wine_description: It has fruit flavors, vibrant acidity and mature, muscular tannins allowed us to complement the wine with bolder amounts of vanilla-oak and mocha nuances this year—both from new barrels and long oak aging.

name: Antinori Pian delle Vigne Rosso di Montalcino 2015
wine_name: Pian delle Vigne Rosso di Montalcino
wine_description: Marchesi Antinori’s passion for viticulture is expressed through perseverance: their continuous pursuit for quality improvement, even in the smallest details. Research and development is an ongoing process both in the vineyards and in the cellars: selecting new clones of local and international varieties: experimenting with new techniques in the vineyards and vineyard altitudes, new approaches to fermentation and temperature control, experimenting with both traditional and innovative winemaking philosophies, using new types of oak for barrels, barrel size and age, and varying length of aging in the bottle before commercial release.

name: Cos d'Estournel Cos d'Estournel 2004
wine_description: The call of faraway lands. As mysterious and intriguing as a lone adventurer returning from a solitary sail, Cos d’Estournel is slow to reveal itself. Little by little, it evokes stories of distant places, market stalls brimming with unfamiliar fruits, spices and wares, village festivities warmed by the joy of revelers and the setting sun, and sumptuous visions of ladies and their voluptuous curves. A myriad of scents, colors and tastes appeals to the senses. The Grand Vin of Cos d’Estournel is both demure and deliberately sensuous, a fascinating and elegant nectar.

name: Prunotto Barolo 2015
wine_description: Garnet red in color with ample and complex aromas of violets and berry fruit, full and velvety in flavour and very balanced.

name: Masi Costasera Amarone della Valpolicella Classico 2015
wine_description: Deep ruby ​​red. Stewed fruit, plum and cherry to the nose. Fruity aromas with notes of coffee and cocoa. Extremely balanced.

name: Château Pichon Longueville Comtesse de Lalande Réserve (de la Comtesse) Pauillac 2009
wine_description: Complexity, elegance and longevity are the hallmarks of this race. The nose is distinguished by a bouquet of aromas, mixing blackcurrant and violet, vanilla and cinnamon. On the palate, the tannins appear mature and melted, revealing a strong and affirmed structure, a surprising suppleness, perfect harmony and long persistency.

name: Château Cantemerle Haut-Médoc (Grand Cru Classé) 2011
wine_description: Attractive aromas of pepper and licorice, evolving towards red fruit after agitation. The palate shows a harmonious marriage of charm and firmness based on soft, ripe, and very smooth tannins.

name: Silver Oak Alexander Valley Cabernet Sauvignon 2015
La Rioja Alta Gran Reserva 890 2005
wine_description: Tile red colour. The initial aroma is both complex and powerful. In the mouth the wine is powerful and balanced with smooth and silky tannins coupled with a noteworthy light acidity. The aftertaste is full and very complex leaving the flavours full on the palate.

name: Domaine du Tariquet Côtes de Gascogne Premières Grives 2018
wine_description: Late autumn, mature grapes packed with sweetness and pleasure produce an elegant wine, with fine typicity. Great fullness on the palate, with delicious tropical flavours, sustained by freshness. Balanced sweetness leads to fresh grapes on the finish - an instant delight.

name: Gérard Bertrand Terroir Languedoc (Syrah - Grenache) 2017
wine_description: Aromas of ripe red fruit, backed by notes of liquorice, gingerbread and scrubland.

name: Domaine Drouhin Pinot Noir 2014
wine_description: Medium-deep garnet color, with a dark core. The wine is refined, with clear notes of spice, rose, black cherry, plum, and sweet red fruits, all wrapped in an earthiness that lends a surprising rustic touch. On the palate, the aromatics follow through with layered spice, white pepper, dark cherry and black berry, framed by youthful tannins. The finish is long and the texture has real depth.

name: Château Pontet-Canet Pauillac (Grand Cru Classé) 2006
wine_description: Very intense colour. Very intense nose, marked by notes of cherry, blackberry and redcurrant with traces of vanilla, liquorice and cedar. The attack is full to the palate. The tannins of great smoothness reveal a fine elegance. The finish, with no trace of aggressiveness, is marked by a good length.

name: Château Cantemerle Haut-Médoc (Grand Cru Classé) 2009
wine_description: Attractive aromas of pepper and licorice, evolving towards red fruit after agitation. The palate shows a harmonious marriage of charm and firmness based on soft, ripe, and very smooth tannins.

name: Château Pontet-Canet Pauillac (Grand Cru Classé) 2009
wine_description: Very intense colour. Very intense nose, marked by notes of cherry, blackberry and redcurrant with traces of vanilla, liquorice and cedar. The attack is full to the palate. The tannins of great smoothness reveal a fine elegance. The finish, with no trace of aggressiveness, is marked by a good length.

name: Château Pontet-Canet Pauillac (Grand Cru Classé) 2008
wine_description: Very intense colour. Very intense nose, marked by notes of cherry, blackberry and redcurrant with traces of vanilla, liquorice and cedar. The attack is full to the palate. The tannins of great smoothness reveal a fine elegance. The finish, with no trace of aggressiveness, is marked by a good length.

name: Château Pichon Baron Pauillac (Grand Cru Classé) 2005
wine_description: A wine of great personality with fresh red-fruit and blackberry scents. It is quick to express itself on the palate, rolling out its assertive, powerful character and rich flesh. The finish is very long-lasting, with dense, precise tannins. A finely-balanced wine of substance with firm structure and body.

name: San Felice Il Grigio Chianti Classico Riserva 2012
wine_description: Deep ruby red colour. Aroma: intense and persistent with the typical notes of sweet violet and wild red berries. An austere, full-bodied wine, with succulent tannins and fresh acidity. Enriched with an aromatic complexity that originates from a delicate dosing of wood.

name: Domaine du Vieux Télégraphe Châteauneuf-du-Pape (La Crau) 2012
wine_description: Deep ruby with some purple nuances, this wine is medium to full-bodied and reveals notes of licorice, pepper, Asian spices, black cherry, raspberry, and currant, as well as a relatively big, sweet palate impression with moderate tannin in the finish.

name: Bolla Le Poiane Valpolicella Ripasso Classico Superiore 2016
wine_name: Le Poiane Valpolicella Ripasso Classico Superiore
wine_description: It is a wine with an intense ruby red colour, with a winy complex and fine perfume with hints of spices and black pepper and with a dry, velvety and harmonious flavour.

name: Château de Saint Cosme Saint Cosme Côtes du Rhône 2018
Leyda Pinot Noir (Reserva) 2015
wine_description: Earthy notes, mineral and herbaceous makes this wine a true example of Leyda Valley. In palate is fruit concentrated with a lively acidity that enlarges the ending.

name: Château Smith Haut-Lafitte Pessac-Léognan (Grand Cru Classé de Graves) 2011
Clarendelle Bordeaux 2015
wine_description: The wine has a brilliant, intense red colour. The nose is redolent of black fruit (Burlat cherry, plum) and beautiful floral aromas. These fruity flavours carry over to the palate, which also features peppery and spicy notes. The wine has an elegant, fine-grained tannic structure.

name: Torres Mas La Plana Cabernet Sauvignon 2012
Trimbach Gewürztraminer Alsace 2015
wine_description: This variety really comes into its own in Alsace exhibiting the full aroma of the grape. Its wines are full, balanced and very aromatic.

name: Numanthia Numanthia 2014
wine_description: The wine is bright red with intense ruby glints. This intensely aromatic wine displays black fruit, blueberry and blackcurrant, accompanied by notes of fig. Hints of black pepper and clove add spice to the toasted hazelnut aromas. A long and persistent finish of tobacco leaves and balsamic notes highlight the complexity of this wine.

name: Château Pontet-Canet Pauillac (Grand Cru Classé) 2011
wine_description: Very intense colour. Very intense nose, marked by notes of cherry, blackberry and redcurrant with traces of vanilla, liquorice and cedar. The attack is full to the palate. The tannins of great smoothness reveal a fine elegance. The finish, with no trace of aggressiveness, is marked by a good length.

name: Barton & Guestier Bordeaux Merlot - Cabernet Sauvignon 2016
wine_description: A complex wine with ripe, rich flavours of blackcurrants and spice, with a long aftertaste.

name: Marchesi di Barolo Barbaresco 2013
wine_description: Garnet red with ruby reflections. Less intense with hints of fruit, dog rose and spices. Full flavor, elegant, full bodied, reminiscent of the smells.

name: Château Lagrange Les Fiefs de Lagrange Saint-Julien 2010
wine_description: Lively, intense color, without premature evolution. The nose has a fine, elegant character with aromas of ripe fruit and slightly woody notes. In the mouth, the balance is long and consistent. The aftertaste brings out the purity of the fruit thanks to moderate tannins.

name: R. López de Heredia Viña Tondonia Viña Cubillo 2010
wine_description: Bright ruby in colour. Fresh and slight notes of liquorice with consistent texture and persistent aroma. Smooth, fresh and persistent.

name: Château La Nerthe Châteauneuf-du-Pape 2015
wine_description: A wine with a beautiful dark color, with purple reflections. On the nose, we are seduced by the intensity and the purity of the fruit,by the discrete perception of the aromas coming from the ageing in barrels, by the touch of velvet that bring so much complexity. On the palate, the charm continue to operate. The wine is perfectly balanced, fleshy, round, structured, but still dominated by this finese and precision that makes it accessible. The finish is long with hints of sweetness, fruit paste, and sweet spices.

name: Château Kefraya Les Bretèches 2017
wine_description: Ruby, limpid and brilliant with slightly tiled reflections. The first bouquet is fresh and of good intensity, revealing subtle notes of cooked fruits, syrup macerated fruits and jam. The second bouquet is more delicate offering notes of light wood, mushroom and spices. On the palate, this wine is balanced and structured. It mainly displays spiced and fruity notes sensed by the nose.

name: Château Pontet-Canet Pauillac (Grand Cru Classé) 2010
wine_description: Very intense colour. Very intense nose, marked by notes of cherry, blackberry and redcurrant with traces of vanilla, liquorice and cedar. The attack is full to the palate. The tannins of great smoothness reveal a fine elegance. The finish, with no trace of aggressiveness, is marked by a good length.

name: Prunotto Barolo 2014
wine_description: Garnet red in color with ample and complex aromas of violets and berry fruit, full and velvety in flavour and very balanced.

name: Col d'Orcia Rosso di Montalcino 2016
wine_description: It has a deep ruby red colour with violet hues. Intense, fruity and elegant, the evident hints of ripe red fruits are balanced with the scents of oak originated by the ageing in the barrels. Good structure, warm and full-bodied, with soft elegant tannins. Long and persistent fruity aftertaste.

name: Ponte Lungo Curioso 2017
wine_description: Mario Ercolini does it slightly different than in other wineries in Tuscany. They allow the classic style that has existed for years, go and look further. With the Curioso they use the techniques of Amarone: 15% of the sangiovese grapes are left to dry on the vine. A modern, full-bodied, very fruity style that people love.

name: Château d'Armailhac Pauillac (Grand Cru Classé) 2011
wine_description: A dense and deep red with a violet tint, the wine has a still slightly reserved nose which opens with airing on hints of cassis, blackberry and fresh red fruit mingled with touches of cedarwood. The attack is nicely rounded, with well-integrated tannins that fill out on a mid-palate full of fruit. The flavours linger pleasingly in a full and expressive finish that gives the wine a fine overall balance.

name: Pago del Cielo Celeste Roble 2015
wine_description: Picota cherry in hue with hints of mauve. Aroma of red fruit salad over a light, spicy background. Lush, fresh attack that persists throughout the mouth, reflecting its body and youth.

name: Ravenswood Old Vine Zinfandel 2016
wine_description: Tannins present along with a touch of smoke. Full body, taste of spice and fruit.

name: Château Pontet-Canet Pauillac (Grand Cru Classé) 2000
wine_description: Very intense colour. Very intense nose, marked by notes of cherry, blackberry and redcurrant with traces of vanilla, liquorice and cedar. The attack is full to the palate. The tannins of great smoothness reveal a fine elegance. The finish, with no trace of aggressiveness, is marked by a good length.

name: Château Sociando-Mallet Haut-Médoc 2009
wine_description: Opaque black/purple colour, with notes of crushed rock, white flowers, graphite, blueberry and cassis, the wine is tight and needs to be coaxed from the glass. It is medium to full-bodied, with an excruciatingly tough-textured finish.

name: Masi Serego Alighieri Vaio Armaron Amarone della Valpolicella Classico 2011
wine_name: Serego Alighieri Vaio Armaron Amarone della Valpolicella Classico
wine_description: Deep, bright, ruby red. Complex, super-ripe cherries with baked plums. Cherry and berry fruit tastes. Spicy hints of cinnamon and vanilla.

name: E. Guigal Crozes-Hermitage Rouge 2015
wine_description: Very dark and deep in colour. On the nose small red fruits like cherry and strawberry and delicate oak aromas. Fresh, very present tannins brought by a long oak aging.

name: Château Poujeaux Moulis-en-Médoc 2010
wine_description: Lovely bright fruit, with a crystalline black summer berry character. The palate has good freshness, with a crisp style, and crunchy black fruits. There is even a little suppleness to it. Firm, tannic backbone too, with good acidity.

name: Château de Beaucastel Coudoulet de Beaucastel Côtes-du-Rhône 2016
wine_description: Dark garnet in color, fading to pink at the rim. Full bodied, smooth textured and well structured, with good length, this one really benefits from some extended air, as the fruit turns richer and sweeter.

name: Pago de Los Capellanes Reserva Tinto 2015
wine_description: The palate has a great balance, with a tasty way, greedy for the maturity of its tannins and lively turn by good acidity it has.

name: Château Lilian Ladouys Saint-Estèphe 2010
wine_description: It is soft and velvety, with blueberry and blackberry aromas. Full body, with round tannins and a long finish. A rich and almost jammy wine.

name: Château d'Armailhac Pauillac (Grand Cru Classé) 2009
wine_description: A dense and deep red with a violet tint, the wine has a still slightly reserved nose which opens with airing on hints of cassis, blackberry and fresh red fruit mingled with touches of cedarwood. The attack is nicely rounded, with well-integrated tannins that fill out on a mid-palate full of fruit. The flavours linger pleasingly in a full and expressive finish that gives the wine a fine overall balance.

name: Antinori Tenuta Guado al Tasso Bolgheri Superiore 2015
wine_name: Tenuta Guado al Tasso Bolgheri Superiore

name: Cos d'Estournel Cos d'Estournel 2006
wine_description: The call of faraway lands. As mysterious and intriguing as a lone adventurer returning from a solitary sail, Cos d’Estournel is slow to reveal itself. Little by little, it evokes stories of distant places, market stalls brimming with unfamiliar fruits, spices and wares, village festivities warmed by the joy of revelers and the setting sun, and sumptuous visions of ladies and their voluptuous curves. A myriad of scents, colors and tastes appeals to the senses. The Grand Vin of Cos d’Estournel is both demure and deliberately sensuous, a fascinating and elegant nectar.

name: Odfjell Armador Carménère 2017
wine_description:
Alluring red purple color with intensive aromas of black fruits and licorice together with spicy notes such as black pepper and cloves, finishing with vanilla and hints of bitter chocolate.
The palate is long and refreshing with soft, ripe fruit and a touch of spices.

name: Château Cantemerle Haut-Médoc (Grand Cru Classé) 2012
wine_description: Attractive aromas of pepper and licorice, evolving towards red fruit after agitation. The palate shows a harmonious marriage of charm and firmness based on soft, ripe, and very smooth tannins.

name: Château de Beaucastel Châteauneuf-du-Pape 2012
wine_description: A stunning example of this Southern Rhône blend with a smooth, earthy nose velvety texture and fruit-forward style; lovely, generous ripe black raspberry fruit and an exquisite finish.

name: Château Larrivet Haut-Brion Pessac-Léognan 2009
wine_description: Beautiful deep garnet-red colour with a complex, charming bouquet featuring roasted and toasty aromas as well as hints of black fruit and vanilla. Elegant, concentrated, powerful, and well-balanced on the palate. Long aftertaste with remarkably smooth tannin. A great wine with fine ageing potential that will richly reward patience.

name: Château Pontet-Canet Pauillac (Grand Cru Classé) 2012
wine_description: Very intense colour. Very intense nose, marked by notes of cherry, blackberry and redcurrant with traces of vanilla, liquorice and cedar. The attack is full to the palate. The tannins of great smoothness reveal a fine elegance. The finish, with no trace of aggressiveness, is marked by a good length.

name: Château Rauzan-Ségla Margaux (Grand Cru Classé) 2006
wine_description: Candied confectionary nose along with some Margaux perfume and flowers. Palate is nicely fresh. Sweet and modern, with rich berry flavours, balanced and nicely proportioned until the finish.

name: Château de Beaucastel Châteauneuf-du-Pape 2015
wine_description: A stunning example of this Southern Rhône blend with a smooth, earthy nose velvety texture and fruit-forward style; lovely, generous ripe black raspberry fruit and an exquisite finish.

name: Dominus Dominus (Christian Moueix) 2011
wine_description: Dark red, almost deep crimson in color. The nose is dense and compact, filled with dark berries, blond tobacco, black cherries and cacao.

name: Château Léoville Poyferré Saint-Julien (Grand Cru Classé) 2006
San Felice Campogiovanni Brunello di Montalcino 2013
wine_description: Intense ruby red colour. Aroma: ripe forest fruits, blackberry conserve and notes of tobacco and leather. Broad, soft and persistent on the palate, with a spirit-steeped fruit finish.

name: Altesino Brunello di Montalcino 2013
wine_description: It a brilliant ruby red colour, tending towards garnet red with age. Its bouquet is intense, pure, pleasant and refined, reminiscent of sweet violet, tobacco, chocolate and pleasant hints of wild berries and vanilla. Its flavour fully confirms the above in a well-balanced, full-bodied wine with good tannins and a solid structure.

name: Cos d'Estournel Cos d'Estournel 2005
wine_description: The call of faraway lands. As mysterious and intriguing as a lone adventurer returning from a solitary sail, Cos d’Estournel is slow to reveal itself. Little by little, it evokes stories of distant places, market stalls brimming with unfamiliar fruits, spices and wares, village festivities warmed by the joy of revelers and the setting sun, and sumptuous visions of ladies and their voluptuous curves. A myriad of scents, colors and tastes appeals to the senses. The Grand Vin of Cos d’Estournel is both demure and deliberately sensuous, a fascinating and elegant nectar.

name: Château Sociando-Mallet Haut-Médoc 2010
wine_description: Opaque black/purple colour, with notes of crushed rock, white flowers, graphite, blueberry and cassis, the wine is tight and needs to be coaxed from the glass. It is medium to full-bodied, with an excruciatingly tough-textured finish.

name: Château La Tour Carnet Haut-Médoc (Grand Cru Classé) 2010
wine_description: Color is deep garnet color with mahogany reflections slightly tuilés.  The nose is complex, we recognize in this order, blackcurrant, plum. Secondly, it is the spices that are expressed as cinnamon. Roasting the notes then appear in the form of wood burned. The mouth: Franche, mouth lets perceive immediately the incredible delicacy of tannins, coated, perfectly balanced. On the palate, ripe fruit and roasting.

name: Château Sociando-Mallet Haut-Médoc 2011
wine_description: Opaque black/purple colour, with notes of crushed rock, white flowers, graphite, blueberry and cassis, the wine is tight and needs to be coaxed from the glass. It is medium to full-bodied, with an excruciatingly tough-textured finish.

name: Cheval des Andes Mendoza 2013
wine_description: Deep, almost black core, with bright violet highlights in colour. It opens with notes of fresh red berries, combined with blackcurrant and redcurrants, followed by roses and violets. It is completed by hints of Asian spices such as fresh ginger, nutmeg and cinnamon. Supplementary traces of licorice and plums.

name: Château Montrose Saint-Estèphe (Grand Cru Classé) 2004
wine_description: It has a fine and elegant robe with a beautifully intense and dark garnet. The nose, powerful and harmonious, is pleasantly woody. Aerated, it reveals lightly toasted aromas, followed with hints of ripe fruits and liquorice. The palate is full and soft with tight tannins and a light sweetness. The finish is long and harmonious.

name: Château Lascombes Margaux (Grand Cru Classé) 2009
wine_description: This wine exhibits a deep blue/purple hue along with a sweet perfume of blueberries, black raspberries, cherries, incense, smoke, and spring flowers. While opulent, underneath the full-bodied richness of fruit and depth, is a structured wine.

name: Château Montrose Saint-Estèphe (Grand Cru Classé) 2005
wine_description: It has a fine and elegant robe with a beautifully intense and dark garnet. The nose, powerful and harmonious, is pleasantly woody. Aerated, it reveals lightly toasted aromas, followed with hints of ripe fruits and liquorice. The palate is full and soft with tight tannins and a light sweetness. The finish is long and harmonious.

name: Château Clerc Milon Pauillac (Grand Cru Classé) 2011
wine_description: The nose reveals finely toasted spice and tobacco notes combined with more intense aromas of red fruit and cherry stone with a mineral touch. The palate is full and well-defined, dominated by the lustre of succulent fruit and refined, flavoursome tannins that open on a hint of chocolate. The long, warm-hearted finish is lifted by a slightly saline taste.

name: Marchesi di Barolo Barbaresco 2014
wine_description: Garnet red with ruby reflections. Less intense with hints of fruit, dog rose and spices. Full flavor, elegant, full bodied, reminiscent of the smells.

name: Ornellaia Bolgheri Superiore 2015
wine_description: With its dense, vibrant colour, it has a nose of splendid aromatic complexity built around a limpid and brilliant fruitiness, underscored by refined spicy and balsamic notes. The mouth develops vibrant and complex fruity nuances framed by a dense, slender structure with tannins that attain a rare harmony between firmness and fleshiness, concluding with a long balanced and fresh finish.

name: Château Pontet-Canet Pauillac (Grand Cru Classé) 2003
wine_description: Very intense colour. Very intense nose, marked by notes of cherry, blackberry and redcurrant with traces of vanilla, liquorice and cedar. The attack is full to the palate. The tannins of great smoothness reveal a fine elegance. The finish, with no trace of aggressiveness, is marked by a good length.

name: Cloudy Bay Pinot Noir 2013
wine_description: Intensely fragrant with alluring aromas of dark plums and lifted hints of blueberry, layered over spicy sandalwood and smoky bacon. The palate is succulent and flavoursome with dark fruits and toasty oak gently supported by plush tannins.

name: Château Pichon Longueville Comtesse de Lalande Réserve (de la Comtesse) Pauillac 2010
wine_description: Complexity, elegance and longevity are the hallmarks of this race. The nose is distinguished by a bouquet of aromas, mixing blackcurrant and violet, vanilla and cinnamon. On the palate, the tannins appear mature and melted, revealing a strong and affirmed structure, a surprising suppleness, perfect harmony and long persistency.

name: Cos d'Estournel Cos d'Estournel 2008
wine_description: The call of faraway lands. As mysterious and intriguing as a lone adventurer returning from a solitary sail, Cos d’Estournel is slow to reveal itself. Little by little, it evokes stories of distant places, market stalls brimming with unfamiliar fruits, spices and wares, village festivities warmed by the joy of revelers and the setting sun, and sumptuous visions of ladies and their voluptuous curves. A myriad of scents, colors and tastes appeals to the senses. The Grand Vin of Cos d’Estournel is both demure and deliberately sensuous, a fascinating and elegant nectar.

name: Château Pichon Longueville Comtesse de Lalande Pauillac (Grand Cru Classé) 2006
wine_description: The wine is seductive when young without prejudicing its longevity. As well as an oaky flavour imparted by new oak barrels, the wines show inimitable aromas of tobacco, violets, blackcurrant and ripe fruit, and also hints of pencil lead.

name: Aalto PS (Pagos Seleccionados) Ribera del Duero 2017
wine_description: Very intense purple colour. Aromas of liquorice, tobacco, noble woods, spices, pain grillé and black berries. In the mouth, this wine offers density and structure, with plenty of silky tannins that provide finesse and elegance. Acidity and alcohol balance each other in a harmonious and lengthy wine.

name: Le Macchiole Bolgheri Rosso 2017
wine_description: Intense ruby color with violet reflections. Spicy notes of green pepper and vanilla, small red fruits very intense and persistent. It's an elegant wine, well balanced. Tannins give a long fresh sensation, with a sweet closing.

name: Château de Beaucastel Châteauneuf-du-Pape 2009
wine_description: A stunning example of this Southern Rhône blend with a smooth, earthy nose velvety texture and fruit-forward style; lovely, generous ripe black raspberry fruit and an exquisite finish.

name: Château Léoville Poyferré Saint-Julien (Grand Cru Classé) 2007
Château Smith Haut-Lafitte Pessac-Léognan (Grand Cru Classé de Graves) 2012
Château Lagrange Les Fiefs de Lagrange Saint-Julien 2011
wine_description: Lively, intense color, without premature evolution. The nose has a fine, elegant character with aromas of ripe fruit and slightly woody notes. In the mouth, the balance is long and consistent. The aftertaste brings out the purity of the fruit thanks to moderate tannins.

name: Antinori Pian delle Vigne Brunello di Montalcino 2008
wine_name: Pian delle Vigne Brunello di Montalcino
wine_description: Marchesi Antinori’s passion for viticulture is expressed through perseverance: their continuous pursuit for quality improvement, even in the smallest details. Research and development is an ongoing process both in the vineyards and in the cellars: selecting new clones of local and international varieties: experimenting with new techniques in the vineyards and vineyard altitudes, new approaches to fermentation and temperature control, experimenting with both traditional and innovative winemaking philosophies, using new types of oak for barrels, barrel size and age, and varying length of aging in the bottle before commercial release.

name: Allegrini Amarone della Valpolicella Classico 2014
wine_description: The result of the Allegrini family’s expertise, a true classic of the appellation, this red wine embraces tradition, territory and the know-how of country ways. Corvina, Corvinone, Rondinella and Oseleta are left to air dry at least until December and are checked daily to ensure perfectly healthy grapes.

name: E. Guigal Côte-Rôtie Brune & Blonde de Guigal 2015
wine_description: Dark ruby red in colour. On the  nose spices, red berries and delicate oak aromas. On the palate a wine with round and soft tannins. Harmony between an imperceptible acidity, tannins giving it a good watch but softened by a long oak aging.

name: Two Hands Angels' Share Shiraz 2016
wine_description: Deep dark red with purple hue. Classic McLaren Vale blue fruit profile with notes of mocha, juniper, pipe smoke and fresh clay. Lovely plump richly-fruited entry, rubber-stamped with notes of simmering plums, mulberry and fruitcake. Turns rather savoury through the mid-palate with hints of dutch licorice, rosemary blossom and boot polish.

name: Château Pontet-Canet Pauillac (Grand Cru Classé) 2005
wine_description: Very intense colour. Very intense nose, marked by notes of cherry, blackberry and redcurrant with traces of vanilla, liquorice and cedar. The attack is full to the palate. The tannins of great smoothness reveal a fine elegance. The finish, with no trace of aggressiveness, is marked by a good length.

name: Château Carbonnieux Pessac-Léognan 2011
wine_description: Medium red color. Aromas of blackcurrant, leaves, bush and earth. On the palate it has notes of fresh blackcurrant, bush and green pepper first, more dried leaves on the midpalate where tobacco and cigar box come along. Scorched earth on the finish.

name: Punica Barrua 2014
wine_description: Lively, deep ruby red nature’s gift of color. Complex scents of mature red fruits such as mainly black cherry, spices, with notes of liquorice and hints of myrtle. It is an elegant wine.

name: Château Carbonnieux Pessac-Léognan 2012
wine_description: Medium red color. Aromas of blackcurrant, leaves, bush and earth. On the palate it has notes of fresh blackcurrant, bush and green pepper first, more dried leaves on the midpalate where tobacco and cigar box come along. Scorched earth on the finish.

name: Château Lascombes Margaux (Grand Cru Classé) 2005
wine_description: This wine exhibits a deep blue/purple hue along with a sweet perfume of blueberries, black raspberries, cherries, incense, smoke, and spring flowers. While opulent, underneath the full-bodied richness of fruit and depth, is a structured wine.

name: Muga Prado Enea Gran Reserva 2011
wine_description: Garnet colour with good robe and slight brick-red hues around the edge. In the nose aromas of spices and chocolate, wrapped up in fruit which is almost like a liqueur. A powerful attack in the mouth, balanced and yet syrupy smooth. With a very long and honest aftertaste.

name: Casanova di Neri Tenuta Nuova Brunello di Montalcino 2013
wine_description: To the nose it has balsamic and red fruit notes, while in the mouth it shows itself with ripen and silky tannins which are supported by a vibrant finish.

name: Allegrini La Grola 2014
wine_description:
A full-bodied, intense and elegant wine. Deep ruby red in colour, it has a wide and embracing bouquet with scents of wild berries and juniper, tobacco and coffee essence. 

La Grola is the extraordinary result of the meeting of two great personalities: the hill of La Grola and the Valpolicella’s autochthonous grapes. The excellent exposure of the vineyards, which enjoy the sun’s warm rays and the cool breezes that come from nearby Lake Garda, allows the grapes to produce their very best. Careful, craftsman-like ageing in the cellar yields a red wine with great elegance, harmony and finesse that can evolve positively for over a decade.

name: Domaine du Vieux Télégraphe Châteauneuf-du-Pape (La Crau) 2015
wine_description: Deep ruby with some purple nuances, this wine is medium to full-bodied and reveals notes of licorice, pepper, Asian spices, black cherry, raspberry, and currant, as well as a relatively big, sweet palate impression with moderate tannin in the finish.

name: Feudi di San Gregorio Greco Di Tufo 2018
wine_description: The perfume is intense and persistent. One can recall in the nose clear sensations of fruit. For the taste, one immediately preceives the broad acidity and the spicy minerality, typical of a vine cultivated in Tufo. Immediately following, there are soft notes of balsamic.

name: Château Pichon Baron Pauillac (Grand Cru Classé) 2004
wine_description: A wine of great personality with fresh red-fruit and blackberry scents. It is quick to express itself on the palate, rolling out its assertive, powerful character and rich flesh. The finish is very long-lasting, with dense, precise tannins. A finely-balanced wine of substance with firm structure and body.

name: Punica Montessu 2016
wine_description: Deep ruby red in colour. Intensely fruity aroma with a liquorice finish to the nose. This is an elegant wine with a full mouth.

name: Château Pichon Baron Pauillac (Grand Cru Classé) 2008
wine_description: A wine of great personality with fresh red-fruit and blackberry scents. It is quick to express itself on the palate, rolling out its assertive, powerful character and rich flesh. The finish is very long-lasting, with dense, precise tannins. A finely-balanced wine of substance with firm structure and body.

name: Two Hands Gnarly Dudes Shiraz 2016
wine_description: Deep dark red, with flecks of magenta at the meniscus. Dark and alluring with notes of blackberries, bramble, roast meats, lavender and coal dust. Lovely density and weight, blackberry and plum cascade across the palate with notes of roast meats, pipe smoke and cedar playing a supporting role.

name: Château Sociando-Mallet Haut-Médoc 2007
wine_description: Opaque black/purple colour, with notes of crushed rock, white flowers, graphite, blueberry and cassis, the wine is tight and needs to be coaxed from the glass. It is medium to full-bodied, with an excruciatingly tough-textured finish.

name: Dominio de Pingus PSI 2017
wine_description: This wine is dense and silky, red in colour with aromas of blueberry, cherry and stone. Limestone, chalky mouthfeel. Full and chewy, it has a very long finish.

name: Château La Tour Carnet Haut-Médoc (Grand Cru Classé) 2011
wine_description: Color is deep garnet color with mahogany reflections slightly tuilés.  The nose is complex, we recognize in this order, blackcurrant, plum. Secondly, it is the spices that are expressed as cinnamon. Roasting the notes then appear in the form of wood burned. The mouth: Franche, mouth lets perceive immediately the incredible delicacy of tannins, coated, perfectly balanced. On the palate, ripe fruit and roasting.

name: Château Léoville Barton Saint-Julien (Grand Cru Classé) 2006
wine_description: This wine has an opaque dark red violet colour. With lovely herbal, lavender and blackberry notes on the nose. Tart berry, blackberry, black fruit palate with depth and sweet tannins.

name: Leyda Carmenère (Reserva) 2014
wine_description: Black pepper and hints of oak add complexity to the nose. In the palate it is soft and juicy, with a silky texture and subtle oak notes at the finish.

name: Domaine Jean-Louis Chave Côtes du Rhône Selection Mon Coeur 2016
wine_name: Côtes du Rhône Selection Mon Coeur
wine_description: Dark robe; blackberry, licorice, concentrated nose. Well-knit, black fruit, tannin thread along the palate that broadens well, gains some chewy tannins at the end. Good, honest drinking with some fullness, late life – has a black pepper aftertaste.

name: Castello di Ama Chianti Classico 2014
wine_description: A luminous and fairly deep green-shot gold in colour. Spacious aromas of fig, apricot, and bitter almond. A dry, crisp entry, then a sweetness on the palate that is delicious but never cloying. Very long, fruit-laden conclusion.

name: Prunotto Barbaresco 2015
wine_description: Garnet red color of good intensity. Complex with hints of red fruit and spicy notes. Full flavor and velvety with a persistent aftertaste.

name: Château Léoville Barton Saint-Julien (Grand Cru Classé) 2004
wine_description: This wine has an opaque dark red violet colour. With lovely herbal, lavender and blackberry notes on the nose. Tart berry, blackberry, black fruit palate with depth and sweet tannins.

name: Château Pichon Longueville Comtesse de Lalande Réserve (de la Comtesse) Pauillac 2011
wine_description: Complexity, elegance and longevity are the hallmarks of this race. The nose is distinguished by a bouquet of aromas, mixing blackcurrant and violet, vanilla and cinnamon. On the palate, the tannins appear mature and melted, revealing a strong and affirmed structure, a surprising suppleness, perfect harmony and long persistency.

name: Château Gruaud Larose Saint-Julien (Grand Cru Classé) 2004
Château Lagrange Les Fiefs de Lagrange Saint-Julien 2012
wine_description: Lively, intense color, without premature evolution. The nose has a fine, elegant character with aromas of ripe fruit and slightly woody notes. In the mouth, the balance is long and consistent. The aftertaste brings out the purity of the fruit thanks to moderate tannins.

name: Château Carbonnieux Pessac-Léognan Blanc (Grand Cru Classé de Graves) 2015
wine_name: Pessac-Léognan Blanc (Grand Cru Classé de Graves)

name: Fèlsina Fontalloro 2011
wine_description: A rich, brilliant ruby red. Good spice on the nose, with generous notes of tobacco and wet earth (and of dry earth as well). The palate is supported by a hefty charge of medium-smooth tannins to ensure the required lengthy ageing. Superb weight and structure, with a classic finish. Significant cellarability in great vintages.

name: Château Grand-Puy-Lacoste Pauillac (Grand Cru Classé) 2007
wine_description: Exhibits classic Pauillac aromas and flavors of creme de cassis along with stony/floral notes.

name: E. Guigal Crozes-Hermitage Rouge 2016
wine_description: Very dark and deep in colour. On the nose small red fruits like cherry and strawberry and delicate oak aromas. Fresh, very present tannins brought by a long oak aging.

name: Château Duhart-Milon Pauillac (Grand Cru Classé) 2009
wine_description: Dark with good concentration, and the nose has a tightly defined fruit character, reticent rather than open, with a light sprinkle of chalk over some floral, black fruits. The palate has a very polished style, with a shell of fruit sitting around a core of very firm tannins which, although a strong component of the blend, do not over-ride the other elements.

name: Almaviva Almaviva 2016
wine_description: Deep, intense, ruby red color with purple tones. Aromas of cassis, black berries and violet, notes of vanilla, cacao, licorice, and spices.

name: Château Pedesclaux Pauillac (Grand Cru Classé) 2010
wine_description: This wine's beautiful purple color is very deep, the nose is very aromatic with nice ripe black fruit. It is  round and harmonious on the palate with silky tannins and a long finish.

name: Antinori Tenuta Guado al Tasso Cont'Ugo Bolgheri 2015
wine_name: Tenuta Guado al Tasso Cont'Ugo Bolgheri
wine_description: Marchesi Antinori’s passion for viticulture is expressed through perseverance: their continuous pursuit for quality improvement, even in the smallest details. Research and development is an ongoing process both in the vineyards and in the cellars: selecting new clones of local and international varieties: experimenting with new techniques in the vineyards and vineyard altitudes, new approaches to fermentation and temperature control, experimenting with both traditional and innovative winemaking philosophies, using new types of oak for barrels, barrel size and age, and varying length of aging in the bottle before commercial release.

name: Château Rauzan-Ségla Ségla Margaux 2009
wine_description: Violets, blackberry, cherry and cedar can be found in the nose and taste of the younger wines. As the wine ages, cassis and spicy overtones appear.

name: Château Cantemerle Haut-Médoc (Grand Cru Classé) 2005
wine_description: Attractive aromas of pepper and licorice, evolving towards red fruit after agitation. The palate shows a harmonious marriage of charm and firmness based on soft, ripe, and very smooth tannins.

name: Pio Cesare Barolo 2014
wine_description: Very rich and delicious with supple red fruits, some ripe plum and floral undertones Tongue: extremely lush on the palate; delicious red fruit; black tea; sassafras root.

name: Antinori Tenuta Guado al Tasso Bolgheri Superiore 2011
wine_name: Tenuta Guado al Tasso Bolgheri Superiore

name: Antinori Badia a Passignano Gran Selezione Chianti Classico 2009
wine_name: Badia a Passignano Gran Selezione Chianti Classico
wine_description: Marchesi Antinori’s passion for viticulture is expressed through perseverance: their continuous pursuit for quality improvement, even in the smallest details. Research and development is an ongoing process both in the vineyards and in the cellars: selecting new clones of local and international varieties: experimenting with new techniques in the vineyards and vineyard altitudes, new approaches to fermentation and temperature control, experimenting with both traditional and innovative winemaking philosophies, using new types of oak for barrels, barrel size and age, and varying length of aging in the bottle before commercial release. To succeed at best expressing what a vineyard, grape, and a winemaker can achieve requires constant trial and error, both in the vineyard and in the winery. At Marchesi Antinori, these experiments include a wide range of different grape varieties and clones, planted in a variety of vineyards, different styles and sizes of fermentors as well as techniques of fermentation; barrel types and sizes; length of barrel and bottle aging.

name: Banfi Poggio alle Mura Brunello di Montalcino 2011
wine_name: Poggio alle Mura Brunello di Montalcino
wine_description: The red color is very intense. The bouquet is sweet and complex, with notes of blackberry jam, tobacco and vanilla. The structure is incredibly extensive but soft and well balanced. Great persistence in the finish.

name: Pine Ridge Napa Valley Cabernet Sauvignon 2014
wine_description: Swirling with layered aromas of fresh red raspberry, blackberry pie and ripe cassis, this deep ruby wine enraptures the senses with fragrant dried violet, gingersnap, dark cocoa and sweet basil impressions. Plush and exuberant, the palate opens with red cherry, juicy boysenberry and red plum fruits that intermingle with hints of cinnamon stick and graham cracker pie crust.

name: Château Léoville Barton Saint-Julien (Grand Cru Classé) 2000
wine_description: This wine has an opaque dark red violet colour. With lovely herbal, lavender and blackberry notes on the nose. Tart berry, blackberry, black fruit palate with depth and sweet tannins.

name: Château Fombrauge Saint-Émilion Grand Cru (Grand Cru Classé) 2010
