wine_description: This wine has an opaque dark red violet colour. With lovely herbal, lavender and blackberry notes on the nose. Tart berry, blackberry, black fruit palate with depth and sweet tannins.

name: Château Fleur Cardinale Saint-Émilion Grand Cru (Grand Cru Classé) 2011
Château de Fieuzal Pessac-Léognan (Grand Cru Classé de Graves) 2012
Château Léoville Las Cases Clos du Marquis Saint-Julien 2009
Schloss Johannisberg Gelblack Riesling Trocken 2017
wine_description: The fruity bouquet presents attractive aromas of sweet pears, fragrant quinces and ripe pricots. dry on the palate, with an attractive, juicy citrus fruit in harmony with the fine-cut acid curve.

name: Château Pichon Longueville Comtesse de Lalande Pauillac (Grand Cru Classé) 2002
wine_description: The wine is seductive when young without prejudicing its longevity. As well as an oaky flavour imparted by new oak barrels, the wines show inimitable aromas of tobacco, violets, blackcurrant and ripe fruit, and also hints of pencil lead.

name: Château Kefraya Les Bretèches 2013
wine_description: Ruby, limpid and brilliant with slightly tiled reflections. The first bouquet is fresh and of good intensity, revealing subtle notes of cooked fruits, syrup macerated fruits and jam. The second bouquet is more delicate offering notes of light wood, mushroom and spices. On the palate, this wine is balanced and structured. It mainly displays spiced and fruity notes sensed by the nose.

name: Château d'Armailhac Pauillac (Grand Cru Classé) 2007
wine_description: A dense and deep red with a violet tint, the wine has a still slightly reserved nose which opens with airing on hints of cassis, blackberry and fresh red fruit mingled with touches of cedarwood. The attack is nicely rounded, with well-integrated tannins that fill out on a mid-palate full of fruit. The flavours linger pleasingly in a full and expressive finish that gives the wine a fine overall balance.

name: Château Malescot St. Exupery Margaux (Grand Cru Classé) 2012
wine_description: Notes of graphite, black currant liqueur, incense and camphor make for a complex and intensely penetrating set of aromatics. Dark ruby/purple, medium to full-bodied, with superb concentration and moderate tannin, this wine is a beauty of finesse and substance.

name: Château Lilian Ladouys Saint-Estèphe 2015
wine_description: It is soft and velvety, with blueberry and blackberry aromas. Full body, with round tannins and a long finish. A rich and almost jammy wine.

name: Château Le Crock Saint-Estèphe 2010
wine_description: This is a rich and powerful wine, with a great aromatic complexity. It presents powerful tannins, a  rich bouquet underlined by a fleshy, full structure that will gain in finesse as the years go by, giving a complex and elegant wine.

name: Château Ducru-Beaucaillou Croix de Beaucaillou Saint-Julien 2008
Château Smith Haut-Lafitte Pessac-Léognan (Grand Cru Classé de Graves) 2014
Château Gruaud Larose Saint-Julien (Grand Cru Classé) 2012
Château Pichon Longueville Comtesse de Lalande Pauillac (Grand Cru Classé) 2011
wine_description: The wine is seductive when young without prejudicing its longevity. As well as an oaky flavour imparted by new oak barrels, the wines show inimitable aromas of tobacco, violets, blackcurrant and ripe fruit, and also hints of pencil lead.

name: Château Haut-Bages Libéral Pauillac (Grand Cru Classé) 2011
wine_description:
Characterised by its red and blackberries aromas but also minerality and cedar. The nose
and the mouth show some freshness. A nice balance with fine tannins. Slightly peppery with a hint of clove.

name: Château Lanessan Haut-Médoc 2009
wine_description: Deeply colored and flavored, fuller than most Haut Medocs. Spice, anise, tar, black-currant and plum flavors lend it complexity and character.

name: Château Lynch-Moussas Pauillac (Grand Cru Classé) 2011
wine_description: Deep dark ruby red color. Complex and elegant nose dominated by fresh red fruit. Rich texture on the palate which shows a solid tannic backbone with plenty of woody and toasted notes. Its long and striking finish promises a superb longevity.

name: Château Rollan de By Médoc 2014
wine_description: A fine wine full of elegance with its opulent nose.This delicious red shows plum, raspberry and blackberry notes. The finish is long and polished, it is a wine considered as the finest Cru Bourgeois.

name: Château Pedesclaux Pauillac (Grand Cru Classé) 2011
wine_description: This wine's beautiful purple color is very deep, the nose is very aromatic with nice ripe black fruit. It is  round and harmonious on the palate with silky tannins and a long finish.

name: Château Lynch-Moussas Pauillac (Grand Cru Classé) 2012
wine_description: Deep dark ruby red color. Complex and elegant nose dominated by fresh red fruit. Rich texture on the palate which shows a solid tannic backbone with plenty of woody and toasted notes. Its long and striking finish promises a superb longevity.

name: Château Smith Haut-Lafitte Le Petit Haut Lafitte Pessac-Léognan 2014
wine_description: Produced mainly from young Cabernet Sauvignon vines on the Château Smith Haut Lafitte vineyard, this is a solid, dark and dense wine. It has rich black-currant flavors that are cut by acidity and firm tannins.

name: Château Guiraud Le G de Guiraud Bordeaux Blanc Sec 2017
wine_name: Le G de Guiraud Bordeaux Blanc Sec

name: Château Haut-Bages Libéral Pauillac (Grand Cru Classé) 2009
wine_description:
Characterised by its red and blackberries aromas but also minerality and cedar. The nose
and the mouth show some freshness. A nice balance with fine tannins. Slightly peppery with a hint of clove.

name: Penfolds St. Henri Shiraz 2014
wine_description: Dark garnet with a deep core. Floral, perfumed, fresh. Boiled-fruitcake mix - nutmeg/cinnamon and mixed spices are laced with glacéed (Cointreau-like) citrus fruits. Subtle praline & liquorice trail on the finish. Medium to full-bodied with an acid/tannin conveyance propelling flavour to the back-palate.

name: Château Figeac Saint-Émilion Grand Cru (Premier Grand Cru Classé) 2011
wine_name: Saint-Émilion Grand Cru (Premier Grand Cru Classé)

name: Marchesi di Barolo Barbaresco 2011
wine_description: Garnet red with ruby reflections. Less intense with hints of fruit, dog rose and spices. Full flavor, elegant, full bodied, reminiscent of the smells.

name: Château Léoville Barton Saint-Julien (Grand Cru Classé) 1999
wine_description: This wine has an opaque dark red violet colour. With lovely herbal, lavender and blackberry notes on the nose. Tart berry, blackberry, black fruit palate with depth and sweet tannins.

name: Hacienda López de Haro El Pacto 2016
wine_description: High intensity coloured wine featuring violet and red tones. Very intense wine and its sound bouquet recalls hints of forest fruits, liquorish, woodland undergrowth, spices and chocolate making it a surprising treat. Full-mouthed, fine wine, while fresh at the same time, with great balance. The aftertaste presents fruity and barrel notes.

name: Penfolds Bin 407 Cabernet Sauvignon 2016
wine_description: Dense dark red. Mint/dry herb (rosemary/sage) varietal reminiscences. Wafts of Chorizo (red) sausage; tomato and red capsicum pizza base/bruschetta. Integrated, perfumed oak (polished teak, brown boot-polish).

name: Château Rauzan-Ségla Margaux (Grand Cru Classé) 2004
wine_description: Candied confectionary nose along with some Margaux perfume and flowers. Palate is nicely fresh. Sweet and modern, with rich berry flavours, balanced and nicely proportioned until the finish.

name: Penfolds Bin 8 Cabernet - Shiraz 2017
wine_description: There is a dense core of black cherry, dark chocolate and black cherry liqueur. Across the palate, splashes of chocolate and mint combine with hints of rosemary and warmed spice. Some cherry, toasty notes are evident from the balanced, integrated oak. This wine has great balance with great integration between good fruit and oak.

name: Château Pape Clément Pessac-Léognan (Grand Cru Classé de Graves) 2013
Mouton Cadet Réserve Saint-Émilion 2016
wine_description: The proportion of the varieties in Reserve Mouton Cadet Saint Emillion respects the typical characteristics of the appellation. Merlot predominates, accounting for 80% of the blend while Cabernet Franc and Cabernet Sauvignon account in equal parts for the remaining 20%

name: Château Léoville Las Cases Saint-Julien (Grand Cru Classé) 2003
Château La Tour Carnet Haut-Médoc (Grand Cru Classé) 2015
wine_description: Color is deep garnet color with mahogany reflections slightly tuilés.  The nose is complex, we recognize in this order, blackcurrant, plum. Secondly, it is the spices that are expressed as cinnamon. Roasting the notes then appear in the form of wood burned. The mouth: Franche, mouth lets perceive immediately the incredible delicacy of tannins, coated, perfectly balanced. On the palate, ripe fruit and roasting.

name: Château d'Aiguilhe Castillon - Côtes de Bordeaux 2010
wine_description: This powerful wine reflects its terroir with intensity and panache. Vigorous and fruity, it is a favourite of people who love wines of character.

name: Donnafugata Mille E Una Notte 2015
wine_description: A structured red wine with a remarkable personality. Complex and elegant offers to the nose a rich bouquet with balsamic scents, floral notes and spicy nuances. This wine is deep ruby-red in colour. The palate opens with floral notes of violet and rounds out with hints of tobacco on the persistent finish.

name: Château Talbot Connétable Talbot Saint-Julien 2010
wine_description: This is a classic, elegant wine, with a clear, well-designed structure and a long, fresh final.

name: Château Gruaud Larose Sarget de Gruaud-Larose Saint-Julien 2006
wine_description: Lovely deep ruby appearance with purple hints. The nose shows aromas of red fruits, fresh cherry, raspberry, light spices. Lots of freshness in the mouth. Fine balance with a great finish.

name: Château Fombrauge Saint-Émilion Grand Cru (Grand Cru Classé) 2008
wine_description: Color is ruby ​​red, brilliant, clear. The nose is rather expressive, of average complexity. The first fruits are blackcurrant and cherry.  Friandy, rather supple, not very voluminous, the mouth is characterized by its balance: an acidity and a quasi absence of tannins favor the impression of roundness. Beautiful finish, elegant, fresh.

name: Domaine de Chevalier Pessac-Léognan (Grand Cru Classé de Graves) 2005
M. Chapoutier Domaine de Bila-Haut Occultum Lapidem 2016
wine_description: Colour : great dark garnet-red. Nose : the first nose is quite closed with a dominant of graphitic, leather, and then intense aromas of pepper, black fruits and scrubs. Mouth : the attack is rich, dense. Then the wine is fleshy and solar. The final is sappy served by delicate tannins and a great freshness

name: Château Pape Clément Pessac-Léognan (Grand Cru Classé de Graves) 2008
Feudi di San Gregorio Aglianico Rubrato 2016
wine_description: Ruby red and clear. The nose recalls the wild black fruit, licorice and underbrush. The taste is balanced with a finish reminiscent of fresh fruit and ends with a delicate balsamic note.

name: Château Beaumont Haut-Médoc 2011
wine_description: Great intensity. Very deep colour with garnet reflections. The nose is very open and inviting with soft oaky notes of vanilla and spice bringing out the red fruits such as blackcurrant and black cherry. The attack on the palate is smooth and fresh. The tannic development is of great quality, with fatness giving real mouthfeel. The lightly oaked fruit aromas are very elegant and contribute to the fine aromatic persistence.

name: Château de Fieuzal Pessac-Léognan (Grand Cru Classé de Graves) 2010
Terres Dorées L'Ancien Beaujolais 2018
wine_description: Color : purple ruby.Nose: aromas of red berries, cherry and raspberry.Mouth: light tannins are felt in the mouth all with great harmony and perfect balance.

name: Château Léoville Las Cases Clos du Marquis Saint-Julien 2008
Egiategia Dena Dela Blanc N.V.
wine_description: A very clear and crystalline colour with very fine bubbles that develop in foam during the service. A mineral nose, salty and iodized, a very fresh mouth and chiseled around a range of citrus fruits such as lime, lemon yuzu, guava and passion fruit.

name: Castellare Chianti Classico 2018
wine_description: The original formula of the famous Italian, maintaining the beautiful red ruby typical of Sangioveto. A wine that wants to reach, with its uniqueness, the maximum of elegance.

name: Château Margaux Pavillon Rouge du Château Margaux 2000
Cos d'Estournel Cos d'Estournel 1989
wine_description: The call of faraway lands. As mysterious and intriguing as a lone adventurer returning from a solitary sail, Cos d’Estournel is slow to reveal itself. Little by little, it evokes stories of distant places, market stalls brimming with unfamiliar fruits, spices and wares, village festivities warmed by the joy of revelers and the setting sun, and sumptuous visions of ladies and their voluptuous curves. A myriad of scents, colors and tastes appeals to the senses. The Grand Vin of Cos d’Estournel is both demure and deliberately sensuous, a fascinating and elegant nectar.

name: Castello Nipozzano Mormoreto Toscana 2012
wine_description: Purple-flecked deep ruby. Rich, ripe fruit contributes to a complex aromatic mosaic, in which blueberry, blackcurrant, dried plum, raspberry, dates, and wild berry jam are discernible, enriched by spicy nuances of green pepper, ginger, and vanilla which act as an effective foil to impressions of cocoa butter, chlorophyll, and tobacco leaf.

name: Château Larrivet Haut-Brion Pessac-Léognan 2012
wine_description: Beautiful deep garnet-red colour with a complex, charming bouquet featuring roasted and toasty aromas as well as hints of black fruit and vanilla. Elegant, concentrated, powerful, and well-balanced on the palate. Long aftertaste with remarkably smooth tannin. A great wine with fine ageing potential that will richly reward patience.

name: Château Fombrauge Saint-Émilion Grand Cru (Grand Cru Classé) 2007
wine_description: Color is ruby ​​red, brilliant, clear. The nose is rather expressive, of average complexity. The first fruits are blackcurrant and cherry.  Friandy, rather supple, not very voluminous, the mouth is characterized by its balance: an acidity and a quasi absence of tannins favor the impression of roundness. Beautiful finish, elegant, fresh.

name: Château Clerc Milon Pauillac (Grand Cru Classé) 2012
wine_description: The nose reveals finely toasted spice and tobacco notes combined with more intense aromas of red fruit and cherry stone with a mineral touch. The palate is full and well-defined, dominated by the lustre of succulent fruit and refined, flavoursome tannins that open on a hint of chocolate. The long, warm-hearted finish is lifted by a slightly saline taste.

name: Château Pontet-Canet Pauillac (Grand Cru Classé) 1996
wine_description: Very intense colour. Very intense nose, marked by notes of cherry, blackberry and redcurrant with traces of vanilla, liquorice and cedar. The attack is full to the palate. The tannins of great smoothness reveal a fine elegance. The finish, with no trace of aggressiveness, is marked by a good length.

name: Château Sénéjac Haut-Médoc 2014
wine_description: Very deep colour with an expressive nose of black fruits and spices. It is powerful and intense, while remaining smooth, thanks to the finesse of its tannins. A charming and distinguished wine that can be drunk young, when its fruity aromas are most enjoyable, or, even better, after ageing to discover the elegance and the richness of its terroir.

name: Château Carbonnieux Pessac-Léognan 2013
wine_description: Medium red color. Aromas of blackcurrant, leaves, bush and earth. On the palate it has notes of fresh blackcurrant, bush and green pepper first, more dried leaves on the midpalate where tobacco and cigar box come along. Scorched earth on the finish.

name: Château Lanessan Haut-Médoc 2008
wine_description: Deeply colored and flavored, fuller than most Haut Medocs. Spice, anise, tar, black-currant and plum flavors lend it complexity and character.

name: Château Pichon Baron Pauillac (Grand Cru Classé) 2001
wine_description: A wine of great personality with fresh red-fruit and blackberry scents. It is quick to express itself on the palate, rolling out its assertive, powerful character and rich flesh. The finish is very long-lasting, with dense, precise tannins. A finely-balanced wine of substance with firm structure and body.

name: Inglenook Cabernet Sauvignon 2014
wine_description: This wine is a deep garnet color with complex fruitand herbal character. The aromas of black currant, cherry and green olives are balanced with a complex bouquet.

name: Château Lynch-Bages Echo de Lynch-Bages Pauillac 2012
wine_description: It displays a striking colour and an expressive nose on aromas of black fruits and spices. The attack is lively and racy and the still-fiery tannins are sure to mellow as ageing takes place in one-wine barrels.

name: Numanthia Numanthia 2013
wine_description: The wine is bright red with intense ruby glints. This intensely aromatic wine displays black fruit, blueberry and blackcurrant, accompanied by notes of fig. Hints of black pepper and clove add spice to the toasted hazelnut aromas. A long and persistent finish of tobacco leaves and balsamic notes highlight the complexity of this wine.

name: Jean Foillard Morgon 2016
wine_description: It contains fairly dark red. Sort of muted nose, not giving much, some blackberry and cherry, earthy notes.

name: Stag's Leap Wine Cellars FAY Cabernet Sauvignon 2014
wine_description: A fragrant nose of ripe blackberry and raspberry along with notes of sweet fig, cinnamon and violet. The palate is elegant with silky tannins and a core of rich fruit with a hint of crème brulee. The wine finishes with a lingering berry pie character.

name: Domaine A. et P. de Villaine Bouzeron 2014
wine_description: Straw Yellow. Medium Intensity, developing, citrus fruits, floral, herbaceous. 	Medium Bodied, dry, medium acidity, moderate intensity, medium-long finish, lemon, green apple, mineral.

name: Mas de Daumas Gassac Moulin de Gassac 'Guilhem' Rouge 2018
wine_description: It is deep, brilliant red. Vinous, complex aromas, with hints of red berries (cherry, blackberry, and strawberry) and spice. Opens soft and fruity with gentle tannins. Delicate and sophisticated.

name: Château Léoville Barton Saint-Julien (Grand Cru Classé) 2012
wine_description: This wine has an opaque dark red violet colour. With lovely herbal, lavender and blackberry notes on the nose. Tart berry, blackberry, black fruit palate with depth and sweet tannins.

name: Château Gruaud Larose Saint-Julien (Grand Cru Classé) 2009
Two Hands Gnarly Dudes Shiraz 2018
wine_description: Deep dark red, with flecks of magenta at the meniscus. Dark and alluring with notes of blackberries, bramble, roast meats, lavender and coal dust. Lovely density and weight, blackberry and plum cascade across the palate with notes of roast meats, pipe smoke and cedar playing a supporting role.

name: Château Margaux Pavillon Rouge du Château Margaux 2005
Donnafugata Sherazade Nero d'Avola 2018
wine_description: Fruity red wine, with a gentle structure, shows a rich bouquet of black currant, sour cherry and berries followed by balsamic and mineral notes. Ruby red in colour, with light violet hues. On the nose, this wine gives off a fragrance of red fruits, red and black cherries and prunes. Upon tasting, it has a fruity flavour with a spicy finale.

name: Château Figeac Saint-Émilion Grand Cru (Premier Grand Cru Classé) 2008
wine_name: Saint-Émilion Grand Cru (Premier Grand Cru Classé)

name: Bouchard Père & Fils Beaune du Château Premier Cru 2016
Château Pape Clément Pessac-Léognan (Grand Cru Classé de Graves) 2010
Château Cantenac Brown Margaux (Grand Cru Classé) 2012
Château Cantemerle Haut-Médoc (Grand Cru Classé) 2015
wine_description: Attractive aromas of pepper and licorice, evolving towards red fruit after agitation. The palate shows a harmonious marriage of charm and firmness based on soft, ripe, and very smooth tannins.

name: Château Pontet-Canet Pauillac (Grand Cru Classé) 2014
wine_description: Very intense colour. Very intense nose, marked by notes of cherry, blackberry and redcurrant with traces of vanilla, liquorice and cedar. The attack is full to the palate. The tannins of great smoothness reveal a fine elegance. The finish, with no trace of aggressiveness, is marked by a good length.

name: Cloudy Bay Te Koko Sauvignon Blanc 2015
wine_description: Aromas of lemon thyme, mandarin blossom and stonefruit combine harmoniously with ginger spice and nutty and savoury tones, underlined by exotic tropical notes. The many-layered palate is creamy and textured, balanced by a clean, mineral acidity. This wine has excellent persistence of flavour and intensity.

name: Château Maucaillou Moulis-en-Médoc 2009
wine_description: It is generally sumptuous in colour, with a particularly subtle and pleasantly fruity aromatic strength, very ripe and concentrated flavours. It is harmoniously balanced, expressive and generous, with finesse and elegance. It has a great length on the palate, with a lively appeal and remarkable cellaring potential thanks to very fine, yet clearly present, tannins.

name: Château Duhart-Milon Pauillac (Grand Cru Classé) 2008
wine_description: Dark with good concentration, and the nose has a tightly defined fruit character, reticent rather than open, with a light sprinkle of chalk over some floral, black fruits. The palate has a very polished style, with a shell of fruit sitting around a core of very firm tannins which, although a strong component of the blend, do not over-ride the other elements.

name: Château Maucaillou Le Bordeaux de Maucaillou (B) 2015
Château d'Issan Blason d'Issan Margaux 2012
wine_description: Deep cherry crimson. Fresh, graphite with pure dark fruit. Lots of lead pencil on the palate and not at all leafy. Lovely purity and very silky, elegant tannins. Aromatic. Cool and fresh and elegant. Lightish but still has lovely scented length.

name: Château Citran Haut-Médoc 2015
wine_description: It has beautiful intense black color with violet highlights.  Expressive, releasing aromas of ripe black fruit with light notes of roasting. Good attack with volume, very present black fruits, beautiful structure, well balanced tannins and harmony, rich mid-palate, long finish with silky tannins and leave its full potential aromatic.

name: Château Gruaud Larose Sarget de Gruaud-Larose Saint-Julien 2000
wine_description: Lovely deep ruby appearance with purple hints. The nose shows aromas of red fruits, fresh cherry, raspberry, light spices. Lots of freshness in the mouth. Fine balance with a great finish.

name: Château Pichon Baron Pauillac (Grand Cru Classé) 1999
wine_description: A wine of great personality with fresh red-fruit and blackberry scents. It is quick to express itself on the palate, rolling out its assertive, powerful character and rich flesh. The finish is very long-lasting, with dense, precise tannins. A finely-balanced wine of substance with firm structure and body.

name: Château Guiraud Le G de Guiraud Bordeaux Blanc Sec 2013
wine_name: Le G de Guiraud Bordeaux Blanc Sec

name: Trimbach Riesling Alsace 2017
wine_description: The Trimbach Family picks the Riesling grapes as late as possible in order to achieve maximum ripeness which, in turn, gives optimum depth of flavour and complexity.

name: Château du Cèdre Cahors 2011
wine_description: Rich and spicy, with charming generosity. While sour cherry, laurel and black olives predominate the nose, the wine tastes medium-bodied and round on the palate, with smooth tannins and crisp acidity.

name: Château La Nerthe Châteauneuf-du-Pape 2014
wine_description: A wine with a beautiful dark color, with purple reflections. On the nose, we are seduced by the intensity and the purity of the fruit,by the discrete perception of the aromas coming from the ageing in barrels, by the touch of velvet that bring so much complexity. On the palate, the charm continue to operate. The wine is perfectly balanced, fleshy, round, structured, but still dominated by this finese and precision that makes it accessible. The finish is long with hints of sweetness, fruit paste, and sweet spices.

name: Domaine de Chevalier Pessac-Léognan (Grand Cru Classé de Graves) 2014
Château Montrose Saint-Estèphe (Grand Cru Classé) 2001
wine_description: It has a fine and elegant robe with a beautifully intense and dark garnet. The nose, powerful and harmonious, is pleasantly woody. Aerated, it reveals lightly toasted aromas, followed with hints of ripe fruits and liquorice. The palate is full and soft with tight tannins and a light sweetness. The finish is long and harmonious.

name: Cos d'Estournel Pagodes de Cos 2012
wine_description: The joy and spontaneity of moments shared with loved ones. An impromptu lunch with friends is the perfect occasion to open a bottle of Pagodes de Cos. It is reminiscent of the simple pleasures of life, like homemade blackcurrant syrup, a bowl of just-picked red cherries or a freshly opened jar of citrus jam. Pagodes de Cos is at once indulgent, comforting and vivacious, like a carefree conversation with family or friends in a familiar place.

name: Château Rauzan-Ségla Margaux (Grand Cru Classé) 2005
wine_description: Candied confectionary nose along with some Margaux perfume and flowers. Palate is nicely fresh. Sweet and modern, with rich berry flavours, balanced and nicely proportioned until the finish.

name: Château Grand-Puy Ducasse Pauillac (Grand Cru Classé) 2012
wine_description: Dark red center and a bluish hue. Intense aromas of blackcurrant, black cherries, shoe polish and herbs on the classic Bordeaux nose. Juicy blackcurrant fruit on the palate backed by nuances of graphite, iron, herbs and chocolate. The taste stretches well over the mipalate and finish.

name: Château Potensac Médoc 2007
wine_description: One of the showpieces of the Medoc, this structured and firm wine has strong Cabernet flavors that give both dry tannins and juicy black currant fruits. Still youthful, this balanced wine is likely to age well.

name: Château Lagrange Les Fiefs de Lagrange Saint-Julien 2005
wine_description: Lively, intense color, without premature evolution. The nose has a fine, elegant character with aromas of ripe fruit and slightly woody notes. In the mouth, the balance is long and consistent. The aftertaste brings out the purity of the fruit thanks to moderate tannins.

name: Imperial Rioja Gran Reserva 2012
wine_description: This wine has great complexity and aromatic quality, aromas of fruit compote, licorice stick, and from aging and aging, such as spicy and balsamic aromas. Also light vanilla, toffee and chocolate appear. Its passage by the palate is friendly and silky with a personality marked by the fineness of tannin.

name: Château Branaire-Ducru Duluc de Branaire-Ducru Saint-Julien (Chateau Duluc) 2012
Château Lascombes Margaux (Grand Cru Classé) 2006
wine_description: This wine exhibits a deep blue/purple hue along with a sweet perfume of blueberries, black raspberries, cherries, incense, smoke, and spring flowers. While opulent, underneath the full-bodied richness of fruit and depth, is a structured wine.

name: Château Cantenac Brown BriO de Cantenac Brown Margaux 2009
wine_description: This wine shows ripe fruit with a good depth and a hint of chocolate. Silky tannins and a firm, rich finish.

name: Château Haut-Bages Libéral Pauillac (Grand Cru Classé) 2012
wine_description:
Characterised by its red and blackberries aromas but also minerality and cedar. The nose
and the mouth show some freshness. A nice balance with fine tannins. Slightly peppery with a hint of clove.

name: Penfolds St. Henri Shiraz 2015
wine_description: Dark garnet with a deep core. Floral, perfumed, fresh. Boiled-fruitcake mix - nutmeg/cinnamon and mixed spices are laced with glacéed (Cointreau-like) citrus fruits. Subtle praline & liquorice trail on the finish. Medium to full-bodied with an acid/tannin conveyance propelling flavour to the back-palate.

name: Château d'Aiguilhe Castillon - Côtes de Bordeaux 2012
wine_description: This powerful wine reflects its terroir with intensity and panache. Vigorous and fruity, it is a favourite of people who love wines of character.

name: Sena Aconcagua Valley 2009
wine_description: Dark, dry red color. The scent has notes of berries, tobacco, cocoa, coconut and pepper. The flavor is intense, with a wealth of nuances and a very nice balance, which gives it a very classic French flavor.

name: Château Sociando-Mallet Haut-Médoc 2014
wine_description: Opaque black/purple colour, with notes of crushed rock, white flowers, graphite, blueberry and cassis, the wine is tight and needs to be coaxed from the glass. It is medium to full-bodied, with an excruciatingly tough-textured finish.

name: Château Haut-Bages Libéral Pauillac (Grand Cru Classé) 2006
wine_description:
Characterised by its red and blackberries aromas but also minerality and cedar. The nose
and the mouth show some freshness. A nice balance with fine tannins. Slightly peppery with a hint of clove.

name: Castello di Ama Chianti Classico Vigneto Gran Selezione San Lorenzo 2015
wine_name: Chianti Classico Vigneto Gran Selezione San Lorenzo
wine_description: Bright red , bright and intense . Bouquet of wild berries red berry . Attack brilliant where the fruity notes are complemented by spicy aromas . Elegant and refined .

name: San Felice Vigorello 2011
wine_description: Dense ruby colour with hints of garnet. Bouquet comprising blackcurrant conserve, spiced notes and forest fruit. Warm, complex, tannic palate with mild notes of vanilla.

name: Gaja Barbaresco 2005
wine_description: Garnet in colour. Aromas of forest fruits, plums, liquorice, mineral and coffee scents on the nose. This wine has a dense structure, flavours of ripe fruit and a full body. It displays a long, complex finish with fine, silk-like tannins and good acidity.

name: Château Pape Clément Pessac-Léognan (Grand Cru Classé de Graves) 2015
Paul Jaboulet Aîné Crozes-Hermitage Domaine de Thalabert 2010
Château Sénéjac Haut-Médoc 2012
wine_description: Very deep colour with an expressive nose of black fruits and spices. It is powerful and intense, while remaining smooth, thanks to the finesse of its tannins. A charming and distinguished wine that can be drunk young, when its fruity aromas are most enjoyable, or, even better, after ageing to discover the elegance and the richness of its terroir.

name: Domaine du Clos des Fées Les Sorcières Côtes du Roussillon Rouge 2015
wine_name: Les Sorcières Côtes du Roussillon Rouge
wine_description: Dark color with violet hues.expressive and enveloping, with red fruit flavors of cherry, raspberry black fruit  spices of pepper garrigue amyl sweet Soft, luscious and delicious, a finesse material on a crisp fruit and pepper, fine acidity bringing much freshness, delicate tannins and a juicy finish.

name: Château Beaumont Haut-Médoc 2013
wine_description: Great intensity. Very deep colour with garnet reflections. The nose is very open and inviting with soft oaky notes of vanilla and spice bringing out the red fruits such as blackcurrant and black cherry. The attack on the palate is smooth and fresh. The tannic development is of great quality, with fatness giving real mouthfeel. The lightly oaked fruit aromas are very elegant and contribute to the fine aromatic persistence.

name: Château Montrose Saint-Estèphe (Grand Cru Classé) 1998
wine_description: It has a fine and elegant robe with a beautifully intense and dark garnet. The nose, powerful and harmonious, is pleasantly woody. Aerated, it reveals lightly toasted aromas, followed with hints of ripe fruits and liquorice. The palate is full and soft with tight tannins and a light sweetness. The finish is long and harmonious.

name: Château Léoville Las Cases Clos du Marquis Saint-Julien 2010
Château Gruaud Larose Sarget de Gruaud-Larose Saint-Julien 2005
wine_description: Lovely deep ruby appearance with purple hints. The nose shows aromas of red fruits, fresh cherry, raspberry, light spices. Lots of freshness in the mouth. Fine balance with a great finish.

name: Château de Camensac Haut-Médoc (Grand Cru Classé) 2005
Château Pichon Longueville Comtesse de Lalande Réserve (de la Comtesse) Pauillac 2015
wine_description: Complexity, elegance and longevity are the hallmarks of this race. The nose is distinguished by a bouquet of aromas, mixing blackcurrant and violet, vanilla and cinnamon. On the palate, the tannins appear mature and melted, revealing a strong and affirmed structure, a surprising suppleness, perfect harmony and long persistency.

name: Penfolds Bin 389 Cabernet - Shiraz 2017
wine_description: Bright, deep-red, with an impenetrable core. Fresh mulberry/blueberry/ blackberry fruits laced with soy & malt, and slices of fresh fig & dates. A sweet middle meshed with tea-leaf/olive tapenade flavours. Rounded, ripe and lush tannins and integrated spicy oak usher in the finish.

name: Il Borro Toscana 2015
wine_description: Il Borro has a purple color with intense reflections purpurei. The smell is intense, full, concentrated, with notes of underbrush and hints of spices. The taste is dry, full-bodied and with soft tannins, consistent and well-blended, remarkably persistent.

name: E. Guigal Condrieu 2016
wine_description:
Visual : Dress Bright and clear golden yellow.
Nose : The nose is very intense floral (violet), and fruits (apricot, white peach and citrus).
Palate : Fresh and roundness. Much fat, rich and creamy for a dry wine.
Ensemble : Harmony of a beautiful freshness and fruit bathed in a fleshy roundness. A remarkable minerality in this vintage.

name: Château Marjosse Bordeaux 2015
wine_description: Beautiful bright purple colour with intense violet reflections. On the nose candied fruit, cherry and blackberry with toasted oak notes. Soft and round on the attack which reveals a nice fruity flesh with tasty tannins and pleasantly persistent final.

name: Château Gruaud Larose Saint-Julien (Grand Cru Classé) 1998
Château Branaire-Ducru Duluc de Branaire-Ducru Saint-Julien (Chateau Duluc) 2011
Château Lamothe-Bergeron Haut-Médoc 2009
wine_description: Fine rounded plum fruit on the nose. Warm plush cassis fruit with a hint of oak in the mouth. Nice balance and length.

name: Pasquiers Côtes du Rhône Villages Plan de Dieu 2018
wine_name: Côtes du Rhône Villages Plan de Dieu
wine_description: It is deep red colour, the concentrate nose carries aroma of liquorice and compote of cooked cherries with hints of thyme and Mediterranean scrubland. At first, this wine is supple on the palate, with greedy fruit and then we feel the tannins which give a beautiful structure.

name: Château Meyney Saint-Estèphe 2010
wine_description: Shows notes of leather and musk after a period of time. It is full-bodied, well-rounded and structured. After ageing, the wine displays the remarkable charm of the best Saint-Estèphe: complexity, balance and harmony.

name: Château Larrivet Haut-Brion Pessac-Léognan 2010
wine_description: Beautiful deep garnet-red colour with a complex, charming bouquet featuring roasted and toasty aromas as well as hints of black fruit and vanilla. Elegant, concentrated, powerful, and well-balanced on the palate. Long aftertaste with remarkably smooth tannin. A great wine with fine ageing potential that will richly reward patience.

name: Château Lagrange Les Fiefs de Lagrange Saint-Julien 2014
wine_description: Lively, intense color, without premature evolution. The nose has a fine, elegant character with aromas of ripe fruit and slightly woody notes. In the mouth, the balance is long and consistent. The aftertaste brings out the purity of the fruit thanks to moderate tannins.

name: Paul Jaboulet Aîné Hermitage La Chapelle Rouge 1998
wine_description: Intense ruby red, limpid and bright. Highly complex, distinguished nose, revealing the great finesse. Black fruits, sweet spices and, ultimately, finely woody. It is shaped by nature, the sun and the rain. That's why every year, this wine is unique. Discover, vintage by vintage, that gave us this land.

name: Château Talbot Connétable Talbot Saint-Julien 2014
wine_description: This is a classic, elegant wine, with a clear, well-designed structure and a long, fresh final.

name: Château Cantemerle Les Allées de Cantemerle Haut-Médoc 2009
wine_description:
This wine’s black cherry and deep garnet color is typical of Bordeaux. Its expressive aromas open up to show very fruity, raspberry notes. In the
mouth the wine is immediately accessible,
notable for its charm and floral character.

name: Château Léoville Poyferré Saint-Julien (Grand Cru Classé) 2002
Trimbach Riesling Alsace Cuvée Frédéric Emile 2011
wine_description: This harmonious wine is very rich and fat, but has no residual sugar and has a wonderful mineral structure.

name: Château de Nages Vieilles Vignes Rouge Costières de Nîmes 2015
wine_name: Vieilles Vignes Rouge Costières de Nîmes
wine_description: Dense ruby, black color. Very lavish, with a complex array of red berries, pepper & spice, aromatic herbs & (garrigue & menthol). Rich & balanced with a fine tannic grain, it reveals spices, liquorice & minerality in a long elegant finish.

name: Wittmann Riesling Trocken 2018
wine_description: It has fine aroma of yellow fruits and apple, elegant clear structure and juicy freshness.  Dry with a juicy acidity which harmonize with the typical earthy mineral tones; good finish.

name: Château d'Issan Blason d'Issan Margaux 2014
wine_description: Deep cherry crimson. Fresh, graphite with pure dark fruit. Lots of lead pencil on the palate and not at all leafy. Lovely purity and very silky, elegant tannins. Aromatic. Cool and fresh and elegant. Lightish but still has lovely scented length.

name: Château Gruaud Larose Sarget de Gruaud-Larose Saint-Julien 2014
wine_description: Lovely deep ruby appearance with purple hints. The nose shows aromas of red fruits, fresh cherry, raspberry, light spices. Lots of freshness in the mouth. Fine balance with a great finish.

name: Prunotto Occhetti Nebbiolo d'Alba 2015
wine_description: A ruby red of good intensity tending towards garnet. Elegant in aroma with notes of raspberries, this wine is round and elegant and very versatile.

name: Donnafugata Grillo Sur Sur 2018
wine_description: Is crisp and fruity, with notes of white peaches and grapefruits combined with hints of aromatic herbs. Brilliant straw yellow, it offers a crisp and fruity nose, with notes of white peaches and grapefruits combined with hints of aromatic herbs. An ample and clean palate, with perfectly integrated savory notes and delicate softness.

name: Château Margaux Pavillon Rouge du Château Margaux 2009
Château de Fonbel Saint-Émilion Grand Cru 2012
wine_description: Herbs, strawberry and spice are in the nose, followed by a medium bodied, crisp, bright cherry finish.

name: Domaine de la Janasse Côtes du Rhône Rouge 2018
wine_description:
Featuring a beautiful structure, this Côtes-du-Rhône develops notes of fresh fruit (crushed
strawberry, blackberry) on crisp, supported by a hint of liquorice.

name: Banfi Poggio all'Oro Brunello di Montalcino Riserva 2007
wine_name: Poggio all'Oro Brunello di Montalcino Riserva
wine_description: Intense ruby red colour with garnet reflections, which show after long ageing. In the nose intense, enveloping, fruity and spicy with tobacco and chocolate notes. A full, austere, velvety and appropriately tannic mouthfeel.

name: Château Pichon Longueville Comtesse de Lalande Réserve (de la Comtesse) Pauillac 2012
wine_description: Complexity, elegance and longevity are the hallmarks of this race. The nose is distinguished by a bouquet of aromas, mixing blackcurrant and violet, vanilla and cinnamon. On the palate, the tannins appear mature and melted, revealing a strong and affirmed structure, a surprising suppleness, perfect harmony and long persistency.

name: Fèlsina Fontalloro 2013
wine_description: A rich, brilliant ruby red. Good spice on the nose, with generous notes of tobacco and wet earth (and of dry earth as well). The palate is supported by a hefty charge of medium-smooth tannins to ensure the required lengthy ageing. Superb weight and structure, with a classic finish. Significant cellarability in great vintages.

name: Château Gruaud Larose Saint-Julien (Grand Cru Classé) 1989
Château Pichon Longueville Comtesse de Lalande Pauillac (Grand Cru Classé) 2010
wine_description: The wine is seductive when young without prejudicing its longevity. As well as an oaky flavour imparted by new oak barrels, the wines show inimitable aromas of tobacco, violets, blackcurrant and ripe fruit, and also hints of pencil lead.

name: Grosbois La Cuisine de ma Mère Chinon 2018
wine_name: La Cuisine de ma Mère Chinon
wine_description: The nose reveals intense red fruit blackcurrant, raspberry in the mouth, there is a friant wine, digestible and fruity with a nice freshness.

name: Château Pichon Baron Pauillac (Grand Cru Classé) 1998
wine_description: A wine of great personality with fresh red-fruit and blackberry scents. It is quick to express itself on the palate, rolling out its assertive, powerful character and rich flesh. The finish is very long-lasting, with dense, precise tannins. A finely-balanced wine of substance with firm structure and body.

name: Château Giscours La Sirène de Giscours Margaux 2012
wine_description:
Deep purple color, soft concentrated nose of red fruits and fresh cut cedar. 
Mouth: some ripe fruit, some consentration and bitter, dry and short finish.

name: Château Cantemerle Haut-Médoc (Grand Cru Classé) 2013
wine_description: Attractive aromas of pepper and licorice, evolving towards red fruit after agitation. The palate shows a harmonious marriage of charm and firmness based on soft, ripe, and very smooth tannins.

name: San Felice Vigorello 2013
wine_description: Dense ruby colour with hints of garnet. Bouquet comprising blackcurrant conserve, spiced notes and forest fruit. Warm, complex, tannic palate with mild notes of vanilla.

name: Château Cantenac Brown Margaux (Grand Cru Classé) 2009
Château Malescot St. Exupery Margaux (Grand Cru Classé) 2011
wine_description: Notes of graphite, black currant liqueur, incense and camphor make for a complex and intensely penetrating set of aromatics. Dark ruby/purple, medium to full-bodied, with superb concentration and moderate tannin, this wine is a beauty of finesse and substance.

name: Château Cantemerle Haut-Médoc (Grand Cru Classé) 2007
wine_description: Attractive aromas of pepper and licorice, evolving towards red fruit after agitation. The palate shows a harmonious marriage of charm and firmness based on soft, ripe, and very smooth tannins.

name: Château Prieuré-Lichine Margaux (Grand Cru Classé) 2011
wine_description: A glossy crimson-black hue, with the aromas of blackberry. A soft creamed-fruit substance on the palate, with lots of ripe, supple, velvety tannins and a good core of acidity. Rich, substantial, with a firm grippy finish.

name: Cesari Amarone della Valpolicella Classico 2015
wine_description: Typical aromas of ripe fruit, fruit preserve and cherry are immediately perceived on first olfactory examination. Particularly striking is the incredible long length that lingerson the palate, when the wine displays all its strength through a warm an elegant body.

name: Château Bernadotte Haut-Médoc 2011
wine_description: This wine is both fresh and fruity with solid tanins. It is a Haut-Medoc in a style combining modernism and tradition.  Its texture will gain smoothness with ageing.

name: Château Duhart-Milon Pauillac (Grand Cru Classé) 2011
wine_description: Dark with good concentration, and the nose has a tightly defined fruit character, reticent rather than open, with a light sprinkle of chalk over some floral, black fruits. The palate has a very polished style, with a shell of fruit sitting around a core of very firm tannins which, although a strong component of the blend, do not over-ride the other elements.

name: Feudi di San Gregorio Aglianico Rubrato 2017
wine_description: Ruby red and clear. The nose recalls the wild black fruit, licorice and underbrush. The taste is balanced with a finish reminiscent of fresh fruit and ends with a delicate balsamic note.

name: Pinna Fidelis Ribera del Duero Roble 2018
wine_description: Deep red cherry with purple shades. Powerful fresh red fruits on the nose, well balanced with the oak influenced resin, spicy finos, and slight toasty undertone. Strong, round tannins with a smooth and lingering finish, perfectly balanced acidity.

name: E. Guigal Château d'Ampuis Côte-Rôtie 2012
wine_description: Deep dark colour with mauve tints. On the nose spices, black fruits and delicate oak aromas. A dense, expressive and intense nose with aromas of prunes, blackberry and vanilla. A tannic and racy wine on the palate.

name: Château de Pibarnon Bandol 2015
wine_description: The wine is revealing firmness as well as great elegance. The tannins are distinguished by their velvety texture and finesse. This wine seems to offer juicy fruits from the first sip, it then reveals unexpected depths and lengths with subtle spicy and minty notes.

name: Château Citran Haut-Médoc 2012
wine_description: It has beautiful intense black color with violet highlights.  Expressive, releasing aromas of ripe black fruit with light notes of roasting. Good attack with volume, very present black fruits, beautiful structure, well balanced tannins and harmony, rich mid-palate, long finish with silky tannins and leave its full potential aromatic.

name: Château Calon-Ségur Marquis de Calon Saint-Estèphe 2012
wine_description: The estate’s Second Wine is a different expression of the Calon terroir. With an average proportion of 75% Merlot in the blend, it is enjoyable to drink in the immediate term and exhibits a warm and velvety character. It is aged in barrels, a third of which are new, for up to 18 months.

name: Château Gruaud Larose Saint-Julien (Grand Cru Classé) 2008
Dominus Napanook 2015
wine_description: It dark crimson in color, with a fragrant, rich nose full of blackberries and dark forest fruits. The aroma slowly reveals subtle notes of smoky sandalwood, chocolate, and sweet almonds. The entry on the palate is round, but firm; precise and enveloping. Well-balanced tannins open throughout the evolution, and linger on the finish with cherries, cedar and cacao.

name: Gérard Bertrand Domaine De Cigalus Red 2017
wine_description: Intense ruby colour with a mahogany hue. First the bouquet shouts concentrated, very ripe black fruit. After a little time in the glass, more complexity with grilled spice and toasted oak unfolds. The palate is lush and opulent with velvety tannins. The aromas of black fruit -blackberries, black cherries and plums - reappear with a complex empyreumatic web leading into mint. The finish is long with a perfect balance.

name: Pio Cesare Barbaresco 2011
wine_description: Elegance and velvety, with ripe and spicy fruit. Strong tannins, but elegant. Good structure and concentration. Very long life.

name: Casa Rojo El Gordo del Circo Verdejo 2016
wine_description: Bright and aromatic, the nose shows pear, apple, tropical nuances and fresh herbs; wide and intense on the palate with a spicy richness gained from a period of lees ageing.Straw colour with greenish hints, clean and bright.Expressive clean aroma of fresh fruit, with herbaceous undertones and tropical notes.

name: Château Malescasse Haut-Médoc 2007
wine_description: Ruby red in colour and it offers an intense nose of blackcurrant, blackberry and raspberry, with great maturity. Subtle undertones of roasted mocha give this wine great elegance and added complexity. The palate has a perfect balance of alcohol and acidity. An intense attack builds over a tight, silky tannic structure leading to a long, dense, aromatic finish.

name: Château Marjosse Bordeaux 2016
wine_description: Beautiful bright purple colour with intense violet reflections. On the nose candied fruit, cherry and blackberry with toasted oak notes. Soft and round on the attack which reveals a nice fruity flesh with tasty tannins and pleasantly persistent final.

name: Château La Lagune Haut-Médoc (Grand Cru Classé) 2000
Château Haut-Batailley Pauillac (Grand Cru Classé) 2011
wine_description: Bright ruby color and intense nose of blackberry, cassis, cedar and fresh tobacco. Fine and dense with a beautiful refined personality.

name: Bibi Graetz Testamatta Toscana 2015
wine_description: It has red is supple, with bright cherry fruit offsetting the firm tannins. Tobacco and leather flavors, with a hint of tar, add complexity as this persists through the lingering aftertaste of tobacco and spice.

name: Château Montrose Saint-Estèphe (Grand Cru Classé) 2011
wine_description: It has a fine and elegant robe with a beautifully intense and dark garnet. The nose, powerful and harmonious, is pleasantly woody. Aerated, it reveals lightly toasted aromas, followed with hints of ripe fruits and liquorice. The palate is full and soft with tight tannins and a light sweetness. The finish is long and harmonious.

name: Château Poujeaux Moulis-en-Médoc 2014
wine_description: Lovely bright fruit, with a crystalline black summer berry character. The palate has good freshness, with a crisp style, and crunchy black fruits. There is even a little suppleness to it. Firm, tannic backbone too, with good acidity.

name: Clos Mogador Priorat 2015
wine_description: Aromas of red and black fruits, layered with toasted and spices. Hints of dark chocolate and soft, earthy coffee bean notes develop, alongside a few touches of cinnamon. The palate shows maturity and charisma.

name: Château Canon Saint-Émilion Grand Cru (Premier Grand Cru Classé) 2008
wine_name: Saint-Émilion Grand Cru (Premier Grand Cru Classé)

name: Girolamo Russo 'a Rina Etna Rosso 2017
wine_description: Ruby red Color. Elegant, with good complexity, and with notes of cherries and plums, leather and tobacco. Fresh and complex, with supple, velvety tannins, good structure. Pleasurable to drink, with lovely length.

name: Château La Conseillante Pomerol 2007
wine_description: Very fine, round, very fruity wine, which will provide great tasting pleasure even when young. It is very well balanced and shows lovely freshness, underpinned by a medium structure.

name: Livio Felluga Pinot Grigio 2018
wine_description: Yellow with light copper reflections. Pleasant and intense to the nose, intriguing, aromas of melon, carob, mock-orange blossoms, nectarine peach, pear and almond blossom; hints of candied ginger and papaya. Well-structured palate with notes of apricot and clementine combine with hints of whipped cream, almond milk, pistachio fading towards aromas of nettle.

name: Château La Dominique Saint-Émilion Grand Cru (Grand Cru Classé) 2009
wine_description: Deep and shiny colour with an intense, characterized nose by seducing aromas of ripe fruits and subtle spicy notes. In most vintages, you will find truffle and licorice notes, complemented by peppery and woody aromas. Fleshy and round, with silky and precise tannins. The finish is long and full and leaves you with a pleasant feeling of bliss.

name: Château La Tour de Mons Margaux 2012
wine_description: With an intense colour, the wine displays a very broad aromatic range. Elegant and distinguished, this enticing wine has a fantastic potential for ageing.

name: Château Mouton Rothschild Le Petit Mouton de Mouton Rothschild Pauillac 2009
wine_name: Le Petit Mouton de Mouton Rothschild Pauillac
wine_description: The nose is dominated by red fruit aromas, elegantly underpinned by complex oak. The palate is dense and full-bodied. Silky, highly elegant tannins give the wine exceptional length.

name: Château Teyssier Saint-Émilion Grand Cru 2011
wine_description: These communes provide terroir that produce a wine that may be attacked on release or laid down for a few years. The approach in winemaking, which has all the benefits of the modern equipment afforded by the more senior wines, is new world in style.

name: Château Maucaillou Moulis-en-Médoc 2014
wine_description: It is generally sumptuous in colour, with a particularly subtle and pleasantly fruity aromatic strength, very ripe and concentrated flavours. It is harmoniously balanced, expressive and generous, with finesse and elegance. It has a great length on the palate, with a lively appeal and remarkable cellaring potential thanks to very fine, yet clearly present, tannins.

name: Dominus Napanook 2011
wine_description: It dark crimson in color, with a fragrant, rich nose full of blackberries and dark forest fruits. The aroma slowly reveals subtle notes of smoky sandalwood, chocolate, and sweet almonds. The entry on the palate is round, but firm; precise and enveloping. Well-balanced tannins open throughout the evolution, and linger on the finish with cherries, cedar and cacao.

name: Tua Rita Rosso Dei Notri Toscana 2017
wine_description: Dark purple. Big, bold and ultra-clean with crashed dark cherries and berries on the nose, amazingly pure and fresh. Mid-full bodied with silky tanins, BIG fruit and balancing acidity. Medium finish.

name: Château Ormes de Pez Saint-Estèphe 2005
wine_description: Dark red violet in colour. On the nose ripe currant, red berry and herbal notes. A tasty, herbaceous, berry and cassis palate with a medium finish.

name: Château Dauzac Margaux (Grand Cru Classé) 2010
wine_description: Back on the palate with dark fruit notes with a liveliness giving an elegant freshness. In the final, this liquorice aromas with a long cool confirming the quality of Cabernet Sauvignon. The precise tannins guarantee a nice development.

name: Paul Jaboulet Aîné Crozes-Hermitage Domaine de Thalabert 2015
Quintarelli Giuseppe Valpolicella Classico Superiore 2011
wine_description: On the nose and palate generous blackberry, raspberry and plum fruits complemented beautifully by a generous melange of spices, those including cloves, star anise, cinnamon, nutmeg and juniper. It culminates in a long finish.

name: Château Grand-Puy-Lacoste Pauillac (Grand Cru Classé) 2004
wine_description: Exhibits classic Pauillac aromas and flavors of creme de cassis along with stony/floral notes.

name: Viña Real Rioja Reserva 2014
wine_description: Deep cherry red colour. Very elegant to the nose, with outstanding spicy and fine wood notes. A very expressive touch of very mature and stewed fruits.

name: Château Troplong Mondot Saint-Émilion Grand Cru (Premier Grand Cru Classé) 2012
wine_name: Saint-Émilion Grand Cru (Premier Grand Cru Classé)

name: Château Léoville Poyferré Saint-Julien (Grand Cru Classé) 1996
Domaine William Fèvre Chablis Premier Cru Vaillons 2015
wine_description: It has very pronounced floral and fruit driven bouquet, with lovely freshness and a few mineral notes. Full-bodied palate, with lovely roundness.

name: Badenhorst Secateurs Red Blend 2015
wine_description: It has perfumed, peppery, spicey, smokey and exhibit ripe red fruit notes. As always the palate texture of this style of wine is supple, smooth on the entry but with enough grip to end dry and refreshing. In the mouth the texture and fineness of fruit tannin and drinkability of the wine is immediately evident.

name: Château Latour Les Forts de Latour Pauillac 2005
wine_description: Deep ruby and plum color is accompanied by aromas of smoke, earth, black currants, and notions of walnuts as well as spice box. Round and generous.

name: Château Canon Saint-Émilion Grand Cru (Premier Grand Cru Classé) 2007
wine_name: Saint-Émilion Grand Cru (Premier Grand Cru Classé)

name: Château Pichon Baron Pauillac (Grand Cru Classé) 2014
wine_description: A wine of great personality with fresh red-fruit and blackberry scents. It is quick to express itself on the palate, rolling out its assertive, powerful character and rich flesh. The finish is very long-lasting, with dense, precise tannins. A finely-balanced wine of substance with firm structure and body.

name: Château de Camensac Haut-Médoc (Grand Cru Classé) 2011
Donnafugata Lighea 2018
wine_description: Crispy and vibrant on the palate. It is an aromatic white wine with a floreal and fruity aromas of white rose, orange blossom,peach and candied citrus zest.he dry version of Zibibbo, this aromatic white has a true Mediterranean soul. Bright straw yellow with greenish hues, its brightness becomes grape, pear, melon to the nose; the flower merges with fruit, almond and rosemary. Beautifully caressing, it enchants with the typical features of Zibibbo, pulpy and persistent.

name: Château Duhart-Milon Pauillac (Grand Cru Classé) 2003
wine_description: Dark with good concentration, and the nose has a tightly defined fruit character, reticent rather than open, with a light sprinkle of chalk over some floral, black fruits. The palate has a very polished style, with a shell of fruit sitting around a core of very firm tannins which, although a strong component of the blend, do not over-ride the other elements.

name: Louis Latour Grand Ardèche Chardonnay 2017
wine_description: Colour of this Grand Ardèche is characterized by a pale golden colour. This wine offers lovely notes of brioche, almond, fresh apricot and vanilla. The ample mouth reminds aromas of almond paste and vanilla. Nice final tension.

name: Château Brane-Cantenac Baron de Brane Margaux 2010
Ferraton Père & Fils Samorëns Côtes-du-Rhône Rouge 2016
wine_description: It has garnet colour with ruby reflects. It has very ripe red fruit. It is nicely structured with firm and meaty tannins. It has aromas of small ripe fruit and spices.

name: Château Lilian Ladouys Saint-Estèphe 2016
wine_description: It is soft and velvety, with blueberry and blackberry aromas. Full body, with round tannins and a long finish. A rich and almost jammy wine.

name: Alain Jaume Réserve Grand Veneur Côtes du Rhône 2018
wine_name: Réserve Grand Veneur Côtes du Rhône
wine_description: Intense, brilliant garnet-red colour. It reveals lovely fruit, loads of body and a heady bouquet of ground peppers, raspberries cherry liqueur, currants, and spice box. Full-bodied and dense. A complete wine, rich and elegant, thanks to the harmony of all the elements which make it up.

name: Tenuta Sette Ponti Oreno Toscana 2015
wine_description: Dark ruby red colour tinged with decisive violet tones, expresses on the nose incredible sensations o ullness and complexity with a note of ripe berries that give sensations of chocolate and nuances of balsam. Oreno is a captivating wine, rich in structure but decisively dynamic, enhanced by the nuances of new oak and an interminable nish

name: Château Duhart-Milon Pauillac (Grand Cru Classé) 2000
wine_description: Dark with good concentration, and the nose has a tightly defined fruit character, reticent rather than open, with a light sprinkle of chalk over some floral, black fruits. The palate has a very polished style, with a shell of fruit sitting around a core of very firm tannins which, although a strong component of the blend, do not over-ride the other elements.

name: Penfolds Bin 8 Cabernet - Shiraz 2014
wine_description: There is a dense core of black cherry, dark chocolate and black cherry liqueur. Across the palate, splashes of chocolate and mint combine with hints of rosemary and warmed spice. Some cherry, toasty notes are evident from the balanced, integrated oak. This wine has great balance with great integration between good fruit and oak.

name: Château La Pointe Pomerol 2011
wine_description: The colour is dense, with dark purple tints. Aromas of violet and small forest fruit gently appear. They are followed by cedar, black spices and sandalwood. The palate is smooth and creamy, yet not at all heavy ; beautifully fresh and well-balanced. The length is impressive, caressing and voluptuous with an inviting, mouth-watering finish.

name: San Felice Campogiovanni Brunello di Montalcino 2014
wine_description: Intense ruby red colour. Aroma: ripe forest fruits, blackberry conserve and notes of tobacco and leather. Broad, soft and persistent on the palate, with a spirit-steeped fruit finish.

name: La Braccesca Achelo Rosso 2012
wine_description: The wine is bright red with the typical purply hues of the grape variety. A fresh, elegant wine with strong mineral hints and fruity sensations of red berries and white plums. Sweet, vibrant tannins.

name: Castello di Farnetella Chianti Colli Senesi 2016
wine_description: Very good medium feel with nice tones of red cherries, crushed berries.

name: Château Haut-Bages Libéral Pauillac (Grand Cru Classé) 2004
wine_description:
Characterised by its red and blackberries aromas but also minerality and cedar. The nose
and the mouth show some freshness. A nice balance with fine tannins. Slightly peppery with a hint of clove.

name: Nino Negri Le Tense Sassella Valtellina Superiore 2015
Château Puech-Haut Prestige Saint-Drézéry Rouge 2017
wine_description: Garnet colour. Raspberry, kirsh and plum notes on the nose. Dense and concentrated, a complex wine at each mouthful.

name: Château Latour-Martillac Pessac-Léognan (Grand Cru Classé de Graves) 2014
Louis Jadot Château des Jacques Moulin-a-Vent Clos des Thorins 2016
wine_name: Château des Jacques Moulin-a-Vent Clos des Thorins
wine_description: It has a nice deep garnet red colour. It releases a very dense aromatic spectrum made of baked red and black fruits aromas. The wine is powerful, deep and possesses elegant and long lasting tannins.

name: Château Potensac Chapelle de Potensac Médoc 2012
wine_description: Excellent notes of crushed rocks, red and black currants, licorice and earth. Supple-textured, medium-bodied and nicely concentrated, it should provide pleasure over the next 7-10 years.

name: Cloudy Bay Chardonnay 2017
wine_description: An irresistible mix of ripe citrus and toasted nut aromas reminiscent of grapefruit, fig and pistachio biscotti taken with chamomile tea. The palate leads with savoury notes which give way to a taut citrus core, revealing the vibrant Marlborough fruit.

name: Château Ducru-Beaucaillou Croix de Beaucaillou Saint-Julien 2005
Cantele Riserva Salice Salentino 2015
wine_description: Streaks of garnet giving way to intense ruby red. Candied fruits and spices that evolve into clean underbrush, tea, and amber notes. Enhanced by notes of red flowers, the aromas return on the palate. The tannins and fresh acidity work in counterpoint to create a balanced, soft wine.

name: Château Palmer Alter Ego Margaux 2013
wine_description: Alter Ego is a spontaneous uninhibited wine, soft and round as soon as it has finished barrel ageing. Its lush aromas and supple tannins make it a wine that can be appreciated in the first years after bottling. Finesse and elegance, aromatic richness, harmony and length.

name: Château Cantemerle Les Allées de Cantemerle Haut-Médoc 2012
wine_description:
This wine’s black cherry and deep garnet color is typical of Bordeaux. Its expressive aromas open up to show very fruity, raspberry notes. In the
mouth the wine is immediately accessible,
notable for its charm and floral character.

name: Château Grand-Puy-Lacoste Pauillac (Grand Cru Classé) 2003
wine_description: Exhibits classic Pauillac aromas and flavors of creme de cassis along with stony/floral notes.

name: Clos Henri Vineyard Petit Clos Sauvignon Blanc 2016
wine_description: Chalky and flinty mineral notes are followed by citrus, capsicum and pretty white flower aromas. This wine has good balance, a very nice acid presence and a smooth finish. It is tangy, round, soft, super fruity and easy to drink.

name: Château Lascombes Margaux (Grand Cru Classé) 2003
wine_description: This wine exhibits a deep blue/purple hue along with a sweet perfume of blueberries, black raspberries, cherries, incense, smoke, and spring flowers. While opulent, underneath the full-bodied richness of fruit and depth, is a structured wine.

name: Château du Tertre Margaux (Grand Cru Classé) 2014
wine_description: Great sweetness and flavour. Silky and freshness are combined in this flask to bring you the elegance expected of a great Margaux wine.

name: Château Latour Pauillac de Latour 2010
wine_description: This wine is very fruity and refined with blackberry and fine tannins. Medium to full body with a  clean finish.

name: Château Lynch-Moussas Pauillac (Grand Cru Classé) 2008
wine_description: Deep dark ruby red color. Complex and elegant nose dominated by fresh red fruit. Rich texture on the palate which shows a solid tannic backbone with plenty of woody and toasted notes. Its long and striking finish promises a superb longevity.

name: Clos des Lunes Lune d'Argent 2016
wine_description:
Pale gold color with green hues.
Lively citrus nose,  coated with sweet aromas of acacia and lime.
Rich pulpy flesh of ripe Semillon.  Delicious mineral complexity. The acidity of Sauvignon provides a good tension.
Balanced and fruity long finish

name: Château La Tour de By Médoc 2015
wine_description: A beautiful dark ruby color, this wine has an elegant nose of blueberry, blackberry accompanied by a beautiful empyreumatic palette. The palate is dense, concentrated and fresh and taut tannins give this wine a nice length.

name: Château Sénéjac Haut-Médoc 2015
wine_description: Very deep colour with an expressive nose of black fruits and spices. It is powerful and intense, while remaining smooth, thanks to the finesse of its tannins. A charming and distinguished wine that can be drunk young, when its fruity aromas are most enjoyable, or, even better, after ageing to discover the elegance and the richness of its terroir.

name: Château Ducru-Beaucaillou Croix de Beaucaillou Saint-Julien 2006
Cos d'Estournel Cos d'Estournel 1994
wine_description: The call of faraway lands. As mysterious and intriguing as a lone adventurer returning from a solitary sail, Cos d’Estournel is slow to reveal itself. Little by little, it evokes stories of distant places, market stalls brimming with unfamiliar fruits, spices and wares, village festivities warmed by the joy of revelers and the setting sun, and sumptuous visions of ladies and their voluptuous curves. A myriad of scents, colors and tastes appeals to the senses. The Grand Vin of Cos d’Estournel is both demure and deliberately sensuous, a fascinating and elegant nectar.

name: Louis Jadot Pouilly-Fuissé 2018
wine_description: Emerald gold tones which reflect a wine of finesse and distinction; the tasting is harmonious, fresh, full of flavours with hazelnuts, toasted almonds, grapefruit and lemon aromas.

name: Château Larrivet Haut-Brion Pessac-Léognan 2014
wine_description: Beautiful deep garnet-red colour with a complex, charming bouquet featuring roasted and toasty aromas as well as hints of black fruit and vanilla. Elegant, concentrated, powerful, and well-balanced on the palate. Long aftertaste with remarkably smooth tannin. A great wine with fine ageing potential that will richly reward patience.

name: Château Latour-Martillac Pessac-Léognan (Grand Cru Classé de Graves) 2011
Château La Pointe Pomerol 2010
wine_description: The colour is dense, with dark purple tints. Aromas of violet and small forest fruit gently appear. They are followed by cedar, black spices and sandalwood. The palate is smooth and creamy, yet not at all heavy ; beautifully fresh and well-balanced. The length is impressive, caressing and voluptuous with an inviting, mouth-watering finish.

name: Château Malescot St. Exupery Margaux (Grand Cru Classé) 2009
wine_description: Notes of graphite, black currant liqueur, incense and camphor make for a complex and intensely penetrating set of aromatics. Dark ruby/purple, medium to full-bodied, with superb concentration and moderate tannin, this wine is a beauty of finesse and substance.

name: Château Fleur Cardinale Saint-Émilion Grand Cru (Grand Cru Classé) 2015
Marchesi di Barolo Cannubi Barolo 2013
wine_description: Garnet-red in color with ruby reflections. Intense perfume with clean scent of roses, vanilla,  licorice, spices and toasted oak. Gentle notes of absinth. The flavor is full and elegant, good-bodied and austere with recurring olfactory sensations. The spicy note and the hints of  wood blend perfectly.

name: Château Giscours La Sirène de Giscours Margaux 2015
wine_description:
Deep purple color, soft concentrated nose of red fruits and fresh cut cedar. 
Mouth: some ripe fruit, some consentration and bitter, dry and short finish.

name: Château Grand-Puy Ducasse Pauillac (Grand Cru Classé) 2010
wine_description: Dark red center and a bluish hue. Intense aromas of blackcurrant, black cherries, shoe polish and herbs on the classic Bordeaux nose. Juicy blackcurrant fruit on the palate backed by nuances of graphite, iron, herbs and chocolate. The taste stretches well over the mipalate and finish.

name: Château Pierrail Bordeaux Supérieur 2016
wine_description: This wine is renowned for its deep dark red colour, fine concentration, suppleness due the ripe Merlot. It has aroma of back and red fruits (blackcurrants, blackberries, prunes) with subtle toasted overtones of vanilla. It is well balanced, long in the mouth.

name: Château Lascombes Margaux (Grand Cru Classé) 2008
wine_description: This wine exhibits a deep blue/purple hue along with a sweet perfume of blueberries, black raspberries, cherries, incense, smoke, and spring flowers. While opulent, underneath the full-bodied richness of fruit and depth, is a structured wine.

name: Château Smith Haut-Lafitte Pessac-Léognan (Grand Cru Classé de Graves) 2013
Prunotto Barbaresco 2011
wine_description: Garnet red color of good intensity. Complex with hints of red fruit and spicy notes. Full flavor and velvety with a persistent aftertaste.

name: Château Siran Margaux 2012
wine_description: Produced from soils made up of a deep layer of gravel, the wines of Siran are typical of the great Margaux growths. Both powerful and delicate, they express the perfect balance between tannin, fruit and acidity. They are long-ageing wines, which over time develop sweetness on the palate, giving a characteristic silky and velvety mouth-feel.

name: Château du Glana Saint-Julien 2011
wine_description: It has medium bodied, soft, already approachable with its open, black cherry, earth, red plum, oak and tobacco profile.

name: Château La Louvière Pessac-Léognan 2015
wine_description: Beautiful, very deep and concentrated red colour.Intense and beautifully complex bouquet with hints of spice and very ripe red fruit. In keeping with the bouquet, the wine is beautifully balanced on the palate. The oak is well-integrated with there are overtones of liquorice and red fruit.

name: Château Larrivet Haut-Brion Pessac-Léognan 2015
wine_description: Beautiful deep garnet-red colour with a complex, charming bouquet featuring roasted and toasty aromas as well as hints of black fruit and vanilla. Elegant, concentrated, powerful, and well-balanced on the palate. Long aftertaste with remarkably smooth tannin. A great wine with fine ageing potential that will richly reward patience.

name: Penfolds Koonunga Hill Cabernet Sauvignon 2015
wine_description: The nose is ostensibly varietal and ripe, without any suggestion of greenness. Dark cabernet fruits and tomato leaf aromas combine with complex notes of spice, nutty oak and black olive to create an enticing aromatic lift. The wine shows an impressive mix of spice and berry, with balanced natural acidity  The sweet mid-palate is long and full, with firm tannins and trademark Penfolds integrated oak.

name: Château Léoville Las Cases Saint-Julien (Grand Cru Classé) 1999
Ricasoli Castello di Brolio Gran Selezione Chianti Classico 2015
wine_name: Castello di Brolio Gran Selezione Chianti Classico

name: Château Marquis de Terme Margaux (Grand Cru Classé) 2010
wine_description: Deep ruby ​​red in color with orange reflections, with a characteristic of small wild berries, including cassis and blueberry, with slightly smoky notes of frankincense and spicy tones of black pepper and cloves. Incredibly expressive on the palate, in a perfect blend of fruit freshness and woody notes,leading to a masterful tannins. An accessible style that confirms the long sweet spices final.

name: Château d'Aiguilhe Castillon - Côtes de Bordeaux 2011
wine_description: This powerful wine reflects its terroir with intensity and panache. Vigorous and fruity, it is a favourite of people who love wines of character.

name: Château Haut-Bages Libéral Pauillac (Grand Cru Classé) 2008
wine_description:
Characterised by its red and blackberries aromas but also minerality and cedar. The nose
and the mouth show some freshness. A nice balance with fine tannins. Slightly peppery with a hint of clove.

name: Château Léoville Poyferré Saint-Julien (Grand Cru Classé) 2001
Château Haut-Batailley Pauillac (Grand Cru Classé) 2008
wine_description: Bright ruby color and intense nose of blackberry, cassis, cedar and fresh tobacco. Fine and dense with a beautiful refined personality.

name: Fèlsina Berardenga Chianti Classico Riserva 2015
wine_description: Deep, attractive ruby red colour. Elegantly fruity nose, with marked scents of wild red berries foregrounding nuances of mixed spices. The palate, too, shows excellent fruit supported by judicious tannins. Lengthy finish.

name: Château Rauzan-Ségla Margaux (Grand Cru Classé) 2012
wine_description: Candied confectionary nose along with some Margaux perfume and flowers. Palate is nicely fresh. Sweet and modern, with rich berry flavours, balanced and nicely proportioned until the finish.

name: Château Duhart-Milon Pauillac (Grand Cru Classé) 2006
wine_description: Dark with good concentration, and the nose has a tightly defined fruit character, reticent rather than open, with a light sprinkle of chalk over some floral, black fruits. The palate has a very polished style, with a shell of fruit sitting around a core of very firm tannins which, although a strong component of the blend, do not over-ride the other elements.

name: Château La Gaffelière Saint-Émilion Grand Cru (Premier Grand Cru Classé) 2014
wine_name: Saint-Émilion Grand Cru (Premier Grand Cru Classé)
wine_description: Red color of average intensity. Fruity, fresh and ripe nose. Caressing on the palate of fruity and fresh type. Developing very tasty, the wine evolves with coated tannins and a lovely violet aroma in its persistence.

name: Louis Jadot Meursault 2015
wine_description: It has a fragrant, ripe, full fruited bouquet which is confirmed on the palate, a generous, supple texture and the distinctive hazelnut and spice nuances which carry into a persistent finish of great finesse.

name: Château Siran Margaux 2011
wine_description: Produced from soils made up of a deep layer of gravel, the wines of Siran are typical of the great Margaux growths. Both powerful and delicate, they express the perfect balance between tannin, fruit and acidity. They are long-ageing wines, which over time develop sweetness on the palate, giving a characteristic silky and velvety mouth-feel.

name: Marchesi di Barolo Sarmassa Barolo 2011
wine_description:
Red garnet decided. Less intense with hints of pink stain, vanilla, licorice and spices. Blurred the resin of pine and tobacco.
Full taste and elegant, full bodied, with tannins highlight, which recalls the smells. Pleasing are the spicy and woody notes that blend perfectly.

name: Château Gazin L'Hospitalet de Gazin Pomerol 2011
wine_description: A dark, winey style, with flavors of steeped plum, kirsch and black cherry preserves, notes of singed spice and apple wood and a long, licorice-framed finish. Features a bit of chewy grip, but there's ample flesh at the core for balance.

name: Château Meyney Saint-Estèphe 2007
wine_description: Shows notes of leather and musk after a period of time. It is full-bodied, well-rounded and structured. After ageing, the wine displays the remarkable charm of the best Saint-Estèphe: complexity, balance and harmony.

name: Volpaia Chianti Classico 2017
wine_description: Vivid ruby red in colour. Evident notes of red fruit and hints of cherries. Smooth and well structured with a fruity aftertaste.

name: Two Hands Bella's Garden Shiraz 2014
wine_description: Deep dark red. Black core with red meniscus. Bursts out of the glass almost in a brooding, elegant manner. Juicy red and black fruits with notes of five spice, earth, black pepper and sandalwood. Fresh juicy fruits erupt and roll across the palate as only a great Barossa Shiraz can. Lovely tactile nature with grippy fine grained tannins.

name: Château Gruaud Larose Sarget de Gruaud-Larose Saint-Julien 2015
wine_description: Lovely deep ruby appearance with purple hints. The nose shows aromas of red fruits, fresh cherry, raspberry, light spices. Lots of freshness in the mouth. Fine balance with a great finish.

name: Famille Perrin Vinsobres Les Cornuds 2015
wine_description: Purple, very deep with purple highlights. Intense aromas of violet, black fruit and spice, black pepper and licorice. Round mouth and full of finesse, with elegant tannins.

name: Château Gruaud Larose Sarget de Gruaud-Larose Saint-Julien 2009
wine_description: Lovely deep ruby appearance with purple hints. The nose shows aromas of red fruits, fresh cherry, raspberry, light spices. Lots of freshness in the mouth. Fine balance with a great finish.

name: Pintia Toro 2004
wine_description: Pintia is an elegant wine within the austerity of the region, i.e. delicate tannins embraced by the aroma of fresh fruit whilst avoiding overripeness and liquorice aromas.

name: Château Canon Saint-Émilion Grand Cru (Premier Grand Cru Classé) 2006
wine_name: Saint-Émilion Grand Cru (Premier Grand Cru Classé)

name: Château La Nerthe Les Granières de La Nerthe Châteauneuf-du-Pape 2014
wine_name: Les Granières de La Nerthe Châteauneuf-du-Pape

name: Château Gazin Pomerol 2011
wine_description: Lavish richness offers a wide aromatic range of black and red fruits which harmonises with its intense purple colour. It also offers hints of mint, plum, chocolate, coffee or liquorice, a bouquet of almond, toast, tobacco and vanilla. Maturity gives it a nose of spices, truffles, undergrowth and gamey scents: fur, leather. Its taste is characterised by their silky tannins, their balance and concentration, enhanced by a delicate oaky note.

name: Penfolds Bin 128 Shiraz 2015
wine_description: Deep garnet red. Regional Coonawarra spices coalesce with flashes of wet earth and black cracked-pepper. The nutmeg, along with the lemon zest, is probably oak-derived. The nuttiness almost definitely.  An initial rush of juiciness and lush core fruits - rhubarb/plum/raspberry.

name: Henri Bourgeois Grande Réserve Sancerre Blanc 2017
Château Potensac Chapelle de Potensac Médoc 2014
wine_description: Excellent notes of crushed rocks, red and black currants, licorice and earth. Supple-textured, medium-bodied and nicely concentrated, it should provide pleasure over the next 7-10 years.

name: Château Talbot Connétable Talbot Saint-Julien 2015
wine_description: This is a classic, elegant wine, with a clear, well-designed structure and a long, fresh final.

name: Château Lanessan Haut-Médoc 2015
wine_description: Deeply colored and flavored, fuller than most Haut Medocs. Spice, anise, tar, black-currant and plum flavors lend it complexity and character.

name: Mas Doix Les Crestes Priorat 2014
