wine_description: Clos Floridène Rouge is strongly marked by an unusual association in Bordeaux, With a bright and intense color, it has black-currant and wild strawberry aromas, with hints of mint, liquorice and smokiness. The fruit and tannin are powerful, silky and fresh.

name: Château La Fleur de Boüard Lalande-de-Pomerol 2015
wine_description: Cassis, earth and graphite notes were mixed with mocha and toast on the nose. Very deep though, and quite lovely. Palate was rich, with tons of cassis, along with more graphite, some herbs and a toss of earth, all nicely balanced. Decent length, nice flavours of cassis, green pepper and some smoky coffee ground.

name: Château de Ferrand Saint-Émilion Grand Cru (Grand Cru Classé) 2015
wine_description: 75% Merlot, for fullness, roundness and persistence. 15% Cabernet Franc and 10% Cabernet Sauvignon for fruitiness, structure and complexity. Very expressive and aromatic wines with present tannins which are well-matured.

name: Château Dassault Saint-Émilion Grand Cru (Grand Cru Classé) 2015
Château Picque Caillou Pessac-Léognan 2015
wine_description: The colour is very deep, almost purple. Very fresh nose with lots of aromatic purity, oak is present on the nose but it is well integrated in the fruit. On the palate the wine is very constructed with a more modern smoothness and sensuality. Plenty of volume on the mid-palate with tight-knit but very ripe tannins.

name: Paul Jaboulet Aîné Hermitage La Chapelle Rouge 2001
wine_description: Intense ruby red, limpid and bright. Highly complex, distinguished nose, revealing the great finesse. Black fruits, sweet spices and, ultimately, finely woody. It is shaped by nature, the sun and the rain. That's why every year, this wine is unique. Discover, vintage by vintage, that gave us this land.

name: Château Léoville Poyferré Saint-Julien (Grand Cru Classé) 2015
Château Clerc Milon Pauillac (Grand Cru Classé) 2013
wine_description: The nose reveals finely toasted spice and tobacco notes combined with more intense aromas of red fruit and cherry stone with a mineral touch. The palate is full and well-defined, dominated by the lustre of succulent fruit and refined, flavoursome tannins that open on a hint of chocolate. The long, warm-hearted finish is lifted by a slightly saline taste.

name: Château Kirwan Margaux (Grand Cru Classé) 2003
wine_description: Moderately saturated ruby. Out of a decanter, fairly forward blackberry and floral nose, but the body is light and the wine shows little until some really grippy tannins and acidity appear and bring the wine to a screeching halt. A highly structured Margaux.

name: Château Laville Bertrou Minervois La Livinière 2017
wine_description: Deep ruby-red colored. Elegant bouquet, delicately woody with aromas of very ripe black and red fruit. Harmonious and full on the palate, with good structure and well settled tannins. Fruity and peppery flavors with a long finish.

name: Château Pichon Longueville Comtesse de Lalande Pauillac (Grand Cru Classé) 2014
wine_description: The wine is seductive when young without prejudicing its longevity. As well as an oaky flavour imparted by new oak barrels, the wines show inimitable aromas of tobacco, violets, blackcurrant and ripe fruit, and also hints of pencil lead.

name: Château La Gaffelière Saint-Émilion Grand Cru (Premier Grand Cru Classé) 2016
wine_name: Saint-Émilion Grand Cru (Premier Grand Cru Classé)
wine_description: Red color of average intensity. Fruity, fresh and ripe nose. Caressing on the palate of fruity and fresh type. Developing very tasty, the wine evolves with coated tannins and a lovely violet aroma in its persistence.

name: Domaine de Chevalier L'Esprit de Chevalier Pessac-Léognan 2014
wine_description: It is rich, lively, and complex with very pure aromas. It is a fruity, classy wine, but more open than the grand vin and therefore a treat to drink young.

name: Château Grand-Puy Ducasse Pauillac (Grand Cru Classé) 2007
wine_description: Dark red center and a bluish hue. Intense aromas of blackcurrant, black cherries, shoe polish and herbs on the classic Bordeaux nose. Juicy blackcurrant fruit on the palate backed by nuances of graphite, iron, herbs and chocolate. The taste stretches well over the mipalate and finish.

name: Château Pesquie Ventoux Quintessence 2017
wine_description: It has black berries, garrigues and black olive notes. Very ample structure, richness and power balanced by the freshness of the Ventoux terroir. Black cherry and tarry notes with velvety tannins.

name: Joseph Mellot La Chatellenie Sancerre 2018
wine_description: A pale golden yellow colour with green tints. A concentrated, subtle nose, marked by mineral and floral notes. Delicate on the palate, with a harmonious balance of acidity and alcohol. The mineral finish is full of the finesse and elegance characteristic of flinty soils.

name: Château Sociando-Mallet La Demoiselle de Sociando-Mallet Haut-Médoc 2015
Château Ferrière Margaux (Grand Cru Classé) 2005
wine_description: Good black cherry and cream character. The palate has fine substance, with a slightly leaner midpalate, stony fruit and light tannic structure.

name: Banfi Poggio alle Mura Brunello di Montalcino 2014
wine_name: Poggio alle Mura Brunello di Montalcino
wine_description: The red color is very intense. The bouquet is sweet and complex, with notes of blackberry jam, tobacco and vanilla. The structure is incredibly extensive but soft and well balanced. Great persistence in the finish.

name: Tenuta di Valgiano Palistorti Colline Lucchesi 2011
wine_description: The intense bouquet is reminiscent of spices and ripe fruit. Rich and full bodied on the palate with intense fruity aromas which give the wine its excellent enduring characteristics. The fresh structure is supported by the good content of mature, balanced tannins.

name: Château de la Dauphine Fronsac 2012
wine_description: Deep scarlet red in colour. Developed on the nose with elegant aromas of undergrowth and fresh truffle. Full and mellow on the palate, with well-integrated silky tannins. A pleasant freshness on the finish, with a hint of liquorice. A well-balanced and fully developed wine with all the elegance and complexity.

name: Château Malartic-Lagravière Pessac-Léognan (Grand Cru Classé de Graves) 2016
wine_description: This wine has an purple colour accompanied by an unctuous texture, extraordinary elegance, lots of licorice, graphite, blueberry, black raspberry and cherry characteristics. It has a full body, terrific purity and length and good acidity.

name: Domaine du Tariquet Côtes de Gascogne Premières Grives 2019
wine_description: Late autumn, mature grapes packed with sweetness and pleasure produce an elegant wine, with fine typicity. Great fullness on the palate, with delicious tropical flavours, sustained by freshness. Balanced sweetness leads to fresh grapes on the finish - an instant delight.

name: Château Cantenac Brown Margaux (Grand Cru Classé) 2013
Château Langoa Barton Saint-Julien (Grand Cru Classé) 2012
wine_description: Blackberry, floral and dark chocolate follow through to a medium body, with fine tannins and a fresh finish. With notes of earth and black currant fruit submerged beneath a tannic structure.

name: Château d'Issan Blason d'Issan Margaux 2015
wine_description: Deep cherry crimson. Fresh, graphite with pure dark fruit. Lots of lead pencil on the palate and not at all leafy. Lovely purity and very silky, elegant tannins. Aromatic. Cool and fresh and elegant. Lightish but still has lovely scented length.

name: Château Rauzan-Ségla Margaux (Grand Cru Classé) 1996
wine_description: Candied confectionary nose along with some Margaux perfume and flowers. Palate is nicely fresh. Sweet and modern, with rich berry flavours, balanced and nicely proportioned until the finish.

name: M. Chapoutier Luberon La Ciboise 2017
wine_description:
Colour : intense, brilliant and limpid garnet red colour with purple tints.
Nose : complex and delicate with spicy notes (nutmeg and peppered)and black fruit aromas.
Mouth : the attack is frank with a tight tannic structure. The wine is well-balanced on the palate with black fruit aromas (blueberry, blackberry and blackcurrant).This is an elegant and refined wine with a great persistency.

name: Château Lanessan Haut-Médoc 2014
wine_description: Deeply colored and flavored, fuller than most Haut Medocs. Spice, anise, tar, black-currant and plum flavors lend it complexity and character.

name: Pelissero Barbaresco Nubiola 2014
wine_description: It has an intense ruby red colour, to the nose it has both fruity and floreal notes that go from the ripe red fruit to the officinal herbs. Soft, tasty, velvety at the same time, leaves on the taste buds a note of sweetness and roundness typical of ripe grape with a slightly dry and astringent closure that distinguishes the Nebbiolo.

name: Château de Fonbel Saint-Émilion Grand Cru 2015
wine_description: Herbs, strawberry and spice are in the nose, followed by a medium bodied, crisp, bright cherry finish.

name: Minuty Prestige Rouge 2016
wine_description: It has develops deep aromas of gingerbread, vanilla and stones fruits. its smooth texture and its thick tannins make it as a keeping

name: Château de Pibarnon Bandol 2016
wine_description: The wine is revealing firmness as well as great elegance. The tannins are distinguished by their velvety texture and finesse. This wine seems to offer juicy fruits from the first sip, it then reveals unexpected depths and lengths with subtle spicy and minty notes.

name: Château Bouscaut Pessac-Léognan (Grand Cru Classé de Graves) 2011
Château La Mission Haut-Brion La Chapelle de La Mission Haut-Brion Pessac-Léognan 2011
wine_name: La Chapelle de La Mission Haut-Brion Pessac-Léognan
wine_description: This wine has a dense purple colour with meaty notes of camphor, black currant, sweet cherry and blackberry. It has a lush, opulent texture, and an admirable purity and length.

name: Domaine Félines Jourdan Picpoul de Pinet 2018
wine_description: In the mouth, we find the acid attack typical of Picpoul de Pinet accompanied by a beautiful structure, ample, pleasant, harmonious. The finish is long and exotic. A first pleasant and explosive nose, on aromas of fresh fruits with white flesh, and exotic fruits.  Complex, it expresses notes of citrus, anise, linden, honeysuckle,  acacia, and a slight minerality.

name: Penfolds RWT Shiraz 2011
wine_description: Deep, dark magenta. On the nose, dark spices and saturated fresh regional Shiraz fruits with telltale wafts of blueberry, blackberry, liquorice and black olive. Secondary notes of rosemary, peppercorn, thyme, juices of beef - verging on that of a terrine/corned beef. Subtle cedary French oak in the background.

name: Domaine Les Pallières Gigondas Terrasse du Diable 2014
Le Pigeoulet des Brunier Vaucluse 2016
wine_description:
Color:The wine is red with a violet hue.
Taste:The taste of wine is very soft and delicate, replete with strawberry-cherry tones, hints of blackberry and black currant. The finish is long.
Aroma:The aroma of wine abounds fruity notes that are exquisitely complemented by hints of spicy peppe

name: Château Canon-La-Gaffelière Saint-Émilion Grand Cru (Premier Grand Cru Classé) 2014
wine_name: Saint-Émilion Grand Cru (Premier Grand Cru Classé)

name: Cos d'Estournel Cos d'Estournel 2014
wine_description: The call of faraway lands. As mysterious and intriguing as a lone adventurer returning from a solitary sail, Cos d’Estournel is slow to reveal itself. Little by little, it evokes stories of distant places, market stalls brimming with unfamiliar fruits, spices and wares, village festivities warmed by the joy of revelers and the setting sun, and sumptuous visions of ladies and their voluptuous curves. A myriad of scents, colors and tastes appeals to the senses. The Grand Vin of Cos d’Estournel is both demure and deliberately sensuous, a fascinating and elegant nectar.

name: Château La Gaffelière Saint-Émilion Grand Cru (Premier Grand Cru Classé) 2006
wine_name: Saint-Émilion Grand Cru (Premier Grand Cru Classé)
wine_description: Red color of average intensity. Fruity, fresh and ripe nose. Caressing on the palate of fruity and fresh type. Developing very tasty, the wine evolves with coated tannins and a lovely violet aroma in its persistence.

name: Éric Texier Chat Fou Côtes du Rhône 2018
Domaine Santa Duc Côtes du Rhône Les Quatre Terres 2017
wine_name: Côtes du Rhône Les Quatre Terres
wine_description: It has nuanced, spicy, fruity flavor with hints of blackberry, lavender, pepper, prunes, bay leaf, raspberry and licorice.

name: Château Sociando-Mallet Haut-Médoc 2015
wine_description: Opaque black/purple colour, with notes of crushed rock, white flowers, graphite, blueberry and cassis, the wine is tight and needs to be coaxed from the glass. It is medium to full-bodied, with an excruciatingly tough-textured finish.

name: Château Beau-Sejour Becot Saint-Émilion Grand Cru (Premier Grand Cru Classé) 2014
wine_name: Saint-Émilion Grand Cru (Premier Grand Cru Classé)

name: Delas Les Launes Crozes-Hermitage 2018
wine_description:
To the eye, the dress is dark garnet. 
The nose, fruity, is marked by intense aromas of cassis, plum and violet. 
This wine, full and round in the mouth, presents a powerful tannic structure which gives it a good aging potential.

name: Château Citran Haut-Médoc 2016
wine_description: It has beautiful intense black color with violet highlights.  Expressive, releasing aromas of ripe black fruit with light notes of roasting. Good attack with volume, very present black fruits, beautiful structure, well balanced tannins and harmony, rich mid-palate, long finish with silky tannins and leave its full potential aromatic.

name: Delas Viognier Vin de Pays d'Oc 2018
Château Léoville Poyferré Château Moulin Riche Saint-Julien 2011
Château de Chamirey Mercurey 2017
wine_description:
A dense ruby colour, deep and intense. The nose opens on intense black fruits aromas
(blackcurrant and blueberry) as well as soft spices (cinnamon, nutmeg). Flavourful. On the palate we have a great density and a powerful expression.

name: Charles et Francois Tardy Domaine des Entrefaux Crozes-Hermitage 2018
wine_description: Rich in color, the nose is open, powerful notes of pepper, liquorice. In the mouth the wine is round, silky tannins with almost a sweetness for mature vintages.

name: Château Nénin Fugue de Nénin Pomerol 2012
wine_description: This vintage has a garnet color, intense nose of very pretty red fruit flavors and a sweet mouth in attack, roundness, without harshness, with lovely fruit.

name: Château Ormes de Pez Saint-Estèphe 2014
wine_description: Dark red violet in colour. On the nose ripe currant, red berry and herbal notes. A tasty, herbaceous, berry and cassis palate with a medium finish.

name: Château Bouscaut Pessac-Léognan (Grand Cru Classé de Graves) 2009
Chacra Barda Pinot Noir 2009
wine_description: Pure, minerally and powerful, with concentrated flavors of red plum and dried raspberry, loaded with powerful meaty notes. Sandalwood accents linger on the finish, showing caressing tannins.

name: Cheval des Andes Mendoza 2016
wine_description: Deep, almost black core, with bright violet highlights in colour. It opens with notes of fresh red berries, combined with blackcurrant and redcurrants, followed by roses and violets. It is completed by hints of Asian spices such as fresh ginger, nutmeg and cinnamon. Supplementary traces of licorice and plums.

name: Château Pavie Macquin Saint-Émilion Grand Cru (Premier Grand Cru Classé) 2012
wine_name: Saint-Émilion Grand Cru (Premier Grand Cru Classé)

name: Château Peyrabon Château La Fleur Peyrabon Pauillac 2010
Mas Doix Salanques Priorat 2015
wine_description: Intense, red-fruited aromas over notes of leather and tar. The blackberry toned palate has an equally tarry richness, brightened by a fresh line of refreshing citrus acidity. Complex, bold and generous with superb, harmonious length.

name: Château Malescot St. Exupery Margaux (Grand Cru Classé) 2007
wine_description: Notes of graphite, black currant liqueur, incense and camphor make for a complex and intensely penetrating set of aromatics. Dark ruby/purple, medium to full-bodied, with superb concentration and moderate tannin, this wine is a beauty of finesse and substance.

name: Bénédicte et Stéphane Tissot DD Rouge 2018
Château de Pressac Saint-Émilion Grand Cru (Grand Cru Classé) 2013
Château de Camensac Haut-Médoc (Grand Cru Classé) 2013
Château Barde-Haut Saint-Émilion Grand Cru (Grand Cru Classé) 2014
Ao Yun (敖云葡萄园) Shangri-La (敖云) 2014
Château Pichon Baron Pauillac (Grand Cru Classé) 2016
wine_description: A wine of great personality with fresh red-fruit and blackberry scents. It is quick to express itself on the palate, rolling out its assertive, powerful character and rich flesh. The finish is very long-lasting, with dense, precise tannins. A finely-balanced wine of substance with firm structure and body.

name: Bouchard Père & Fils Meursault Les Clous 2016
wine_description: Intense bouquet of fruit and flowers. This wine is both subtle and very lively. Good ageing potential.

name: Château Pape Clément Pessac-Léognan (Grand Cru Classé de Graves) 1998
Monte del Frá Amarone della Valpolicella Classico Lena di Mezzo 2015
wine_name: Amarone della Valpolicella Classico Lena di Mezzo
wine_description:
Colour: Deep ruby red with garnet highlights.
Nose: Cherries (both fresh and under spirits), plums and liquorice; spices such as pepper and cinnamon; hints of undergrowth.
Flavour: Extremely elegant, well-balanced and velvety, but at the same time robust and complex, dry, full-bodied, generous and austere.

name: Château Cote de Baleau Saint-Émilion Grand Cru (Grand Cru Classé) 2009
Château Laroze Saint-Émilion Grand Cru (Grand Cru Classé) 2011
Terrazas de los Andes Single Vineyard (Los Aromos) Cabernet Sauvignon 2012
wine_description: Deep and intense purple with black hues , this wine is known for its perfect balance between complexity and structure. It oozes aromas of wild black fruits like blackberries, and red fruits like plums and cherries, as well as spices and flowers, like violets and mint. Tertiary aromas of black chocolate, vanilla and smoky notes are clearly present, brought together by ageing in oak barrels. Thanks to a remarkably well-integrated acidity, this wine is lively and fresh, but still robust with a lingering finish in the mouth

name: Henri Bourgeois Pouilly-Fumé En Travertin 2016
wine_description: It has aromatic, floral and smoked nature of the  grape variety is the most dominant aspect of this charming wine.  It displays its elegance, fruitiness and roundness and is very persistent in the mouth.

name: Château du Tertre Margaux (Grand Cru Classé) 2016
wine_description: Great sweetness and flavour. Silky and freshness are combined in this flask to bring you the elegance expected of a great Margaux wine.

name: Penfolds RWT Shiraz 2010
wine_description: Deep, dark magenta. On the nose, dark spices and saturated fresh regional Shiraz fruits with telltale wafts of blueberry, blackberry, liquorice and black olive. Secondary notes of rosemary, peppercorn, thyme, juices of beef - verging on that of a terrine/corned beef. Subtle cedary French oak in the background.

name: Château La Pointe Pomerol 2005
wine_description: The colour is dense, with dark purple tints. Aromas of violet and small forest fruit gently appear. They are followed by cedar, black spices and sandalwood. The palate is smooth and creamy, yet not at all heavy ; beautifully fresh and well-balanced. The length is impressive, caressing and voluptuous with an inviting, mouth-watering finish.

name: M. Chapoutier Domaine de Bila-Haut l'Esquerda Côtes du Roussillon Villages 2017
wine_name: Domaine de Bila-Haut l'Esquerda Côtes du Roussillon Villages
wine_description:
Colour : the colour is intense, deep and steady.
Nose : it shows maturity with aromas of black fruits and warm spices.
We find the soils of origin are revealed with floral notes (violet) which are lightly smoky. We can find the same aromatic notes on the Northern Côtes du-Rhône soils, which are the birthplace of the Syrah.
Mouth : the attack is both supple and powerful. Tannins are at the same time powerful and tight. The finale is fresh without any heaviness.

name: Château Petit-Village Pomerol 2010
wine_description: Red berries, vanilla, violet, truffle, spices. It expresses the successful blend of the Merlot, Cabernet Franc and Cabernet Sauvignon grape varieties. Thanks to the Merlot and the Cabernet Franc, the wine offers aromatic complexity and a long, delicate finish. The Cabernet Sauvignon brings depth and a texture ideally suited for ageing.

name: Château Poujeaux Moulis-en-Médoc 2013
wine_description: Lovely bright fruit, with a crystalline black summer berry character. The palate has good freshness, with a crisp style, and crunchy black fruits. There is even a little suppleness to it. Firm, tannic backbone too, with good acidity.

name: Château Ksara Red 2014
wine_description: Beautiful ruby purple red, a fruity nose of raspberries, black currant and a little vanilla. In the mouth, it has power and length with balanced and mellow tannins that get rounder with time, taking up a leathery and spicy character. This Château will keep surprising, due to its complexity and richness.

name: Domaine Mathieu & Camille Lapierre Raisins Gaulois 2019
Château Cantenac Saint-Émilion Grand Cru 2015
wine_description: Intense color. Its nose expresses aromas of black and red ripe fruits, fine oak and spices. The mouth is round, medium to full bodied, tasty with fine spices and structured by noble tannins. A long, balanced and aromatic finale.

name: Nicolas Joly Clos de la Coulée de Serrant 2014
wine_name: Clos de la Coulée de Serrant

name: Château Lynch-Bages Echo de Lynch-Bages Pauillac 2015
wine_description: It displays a striking colour and an expressive nose on aromas of black fruits and spices. The attack is lively and racy and the still-fiery tannins are sure to mellow as ageing takes place in one-wine barrels.

name: Château Gruaud Larose Saint-Julien (Grand Cru Classé) 2015
Château Carbonnieux Château Tour Léognan Pessac-Léognan 2016
wine_description: The wine had a deep ruby color and was wonderfully soft on the palate. It had aromas of red fruit and cinnamon.

name: Château Clerc Milon Pauillac (Grand Cru Classé) 2015
wine_description: The nose reveals finely toasted spice and tobacco notes combined with more intense aromas of red fruit and cherry stone with a mineral touch. The palate is full and well-defined, dominated by the lustre of succulent fruit and refined, flavoursome tannins that open on a hint of chocolate. The long, warm-hearted finish is lifted by a slightly saline taste.

name: Château Rauzan-Ségla Margaux (Grand Cru Classé) 1998
wine_description: Candied confectionary nose along with some Margaux perfume and flowers. Palate is nicely fresh. Sweet and modern, with rich berry flavours, balanced and nicely proportioned until the finish.

name: Miraval Coteaux Varois en Provence Blanc 2018
wine_description: Beautiful pale yellow colour, bright with golden undertones. The nose is very open with rich aromas of yellow flesh fruit and tropical fruit such as fresh pineapple and mango. The minerality of the Keuper marls on the Chateau’s terroir is apparent here. A few smoked notes. The palate is fleshy and mineral at the same time with aromas of white-flesh fruit, small peaches and almonds. The balance between the minerality and the flesh gives this wine a unique sensation. The final is rich on apricots and is uplifted by toasted aromas.

name: M. Chapoutier Les Vignes de Bila-Haut Côtes du Roussillon Villages 2018
wine_name: Les Vignes de Bila-Haut Côtes du Roussillon Villages
wine_description: Colour: deep red garnet. Nose: black cherries. Mouth: well-structured with sweet meaty tannins. The wine had the heat and wildness of the Roussillon area.

name: Château Grand-Puy-Lacoste Pauillac (Grand Cru Classé) 1998
wine_description: Exhibits classic Pauillac aromas and flavors of creme de cassis along with stony/floral notes.

name: Château Nénin Fugue de Nénin Pomerol 2014
wine_description: This vintage has a garnet color, intense nose of very pretty red fruit flavors and a sweet mouth in attack, roundness, without harshness, with lovely fruit.

name: Château Lanessan Haut-Médoc 2007
wine_description: Deeply colored and flavored, fuller than most Haut Medocs. Spice, anise, tar, black-currant and plum flavors lend it complexity and character.

name: Château de Fieuzal Pessac-Léognan (Grand Cru Classé de Graves) 2013
Jean-Paul & Benoit Droin Chablis 2018
wine_description: It has brilliant, precise and beautifully articulated from start to finish, the impresses for both its balance and potential. Sweet floral notes meld into white peach, mint and slate, all in a bright, crisp style best suited for near and medium term drinking.

name: Cuvelier Los Andes Grand Malbec 2014
wine_description: It has big, dark, powerful, concentrated, aromatic, savoury. But interestingly despite high alcohol, not excessively hot. Very, very nice.

name: Château Fourcas Hosten Listrac-Médoc 2012
wine_description: This philosophy motivates us on a daily basis to produce great quality wines, obviously respecting the environment, which are affordable and drinkable as young wines. A major source of satisfaction and motivation is making wines which are balanced, supple and deep at the same time

name: Gérard Bertrand Réserve Spéciale Pinot Noir 2018
wine_description: Aromas of ripe cherry, wild raspberry and spices, as well as silky tannins and an elegant, balanced finish.

name: Château Lynch-Bages Echo de Lynch-Bages Pauillac 2013
wine_description: It displays a striking colour and an expressive nose on aromas of black fruits and spices. The attack is lively and racy and the still-fiery tannins are sure to mellow as ageing takes place in one-wine barrels.

name: Château Rauzan-Ségla Margaux (Grand Cru Classé) 2013
wine_description: Candied confectionary nose along with some Margaux perfume and flowers. Palate is nicely fresh. Sweet and modern, with rich berry flavours, balanced and nicely proportioned until the finish.

name: Château de Camensac Haut-Médoc (Grand Cru Classé) 2015
Tormaresca Chardonnay Castel del Monte Pietrabianca 2018
wine_description: Bright yellow with greenish hues. Varied hints from citrus fruit to light floral and vanilla sensations. Sea-salt tinged, fresh and mineral with light wood notes.

name: Château Paloumey Haut-Médoc 2014
wine_description: Spice, cedar and cinnamon on the nose. Ample, positive damson and plum frut with a neat oak overlay. Structured, ripe tannins and soft, balanced acidity and a fine, dry finish.

name: Château Pape Clément Pessac-Léognan (Grand Cru Classé de Graves) 1996
M. Chapoutier Cornas Les Arènes  2015
wine_description:
Colour: Dark red with some violet hints.
Nose: Very ripe fruits, raspberry and blackcurrant jams, a bit of smoke, liquorice and pepper.
Mouth: Blackberries, spices, morello cherry. Dense, strong tannins with good length.

name: Château Gruaud Larose Sarget de Gruaud-Larose Saint-Julien 2016
wine_description: Lovely deep ruby appearance with purple hints. The nose shows aromas of red fruits, fresh cherry, raspberry, light spices. Lots of freshness in the mouth. Fine balance with a great finish.

name: Château Meyney Saint-Estèphe 2000
wine_description: Shows notes of leather and musk after a period of time. It is full-bodied, well-rounded and structured. After ageing, the wine displays the remarkable charm of the best Saint-Estèphe: complexity, balance and harmony.

name: Château Laroze Saint-Émilion Grand Cru (Grand Cru Classé) 2012
Joh. Jos. Prüm Graacher Himmelreich Riesling Kabinett 2015
Château Faugères Saint-Émilion Grand Cru (Grand Cru Classé) 2014
Yves Cuilleron Viognier Les Vignes d'à Côté 2018
wine_description: Fond and flattering wine, aromas of white flowers and apricot. Juicy and fresh mouth. Final tangy with notes of apricots secs.Apéritif, gambas a la plancha.

name: Château Léoville Las Cases Saint-Julien (Grand Cru Classé) 2008
Louis Chèze Ro-Rée Saint-Joseph 2017
wine_description: Red cherry robe.Red fruit aroma, blackberry,raspberry, nutmeg.Straightforward attack followed by a beautiful creamy taste with ripe fruits aroma in the mouth.

name: Château Ducru-Beaucaillou Croix de Beaucaillou Saint-Julien 2015
E. Guigal Condrieu La Doriane 2017
wine_description:
Visual : pale golden yellow color and shiny crystal clear.
Odor : White flowers, apricot, white peaches, powerful and elegant aromatic intensity.
Palate : Fresh, round, rich and bold bouche.Expression affirmed the soil. Very fine and very fresh.
Ensemble : Harmony of low acidity and a pleasant fruit bathed in a fleshy roundness.

name: Pierre Gaillard Saint-Joseph 2016
wine_description: Bottled unfiltered, this is a pretty, fragrant and sappy Syrah that offers aromas and flavours of dark cherry, raspberry, dark pepper and other warm spices. The palate is vibrant, punchy and spicy with crunchy freshness and a savoury, energetic close. It will certainly keep opening and gaining flesh as it recovers from its recent ocean voyage. Drink it over the next 3-4 years, or forever hold your peace.

name: Château Haut-Bages Libéral Pauillac (Grand Cru Classé) 2007
wine_description:
Characterised by its red and blackberries aromas but also minerality and cedar. The nose
and the mouth show some freshness. A nice balance with fine tannins. Slightly peppery with a hint of clove.

name: Tommasi Masseria Surani Dionysos Primitivo di Manduria Riserva 2013
wine_name: Masseria Surani Dionysos Primitivo di Manduria Riserva
wine_description: Intense deep ruby red color with hints of plum, blackberry and raspberry, the nose has spicy notes of coffee, pepper and chocolate. On the palate it is fine, pleasant and elegant, of good intensity, persistence and velvet tannins.

name: Paul Jaboulet Aîné Crozes-Hermitage Domaine de Thalabert 2016
Château Valandraud Virginie de Valandraud Saint-Émilion Grand Cru 2015
wine_name: Virginie de Valandraud Saint-Émilion Grand Cru
wine_description: Potentially one of the finest wines I have tasted from this estate, the 2010 offers up notes of crushed rocks, black raspberries and black currants intermixed with a hint of barrique. Medium to full-bodied and pure with a distinctive chocolate/coffee character, it should be enjoyed over the next 15+ years.

name: Château Lilian Ladouys Saint-Estèphe 2013
wine_description: It is soft and velvety, with blueberry and blackberry aromas. Full body, with round tannins and a long finish. A rich and almost jammy wine.

name: Domaine La Barroche Châteauneuf-du-Pape 2013
wine_description: Unique, elegant, silky and opulent wine that invariably expresses its distinctive qualities. It also shows great class thank to its deep colour, floral bouquet, freshness, cocoa flavours and delicate aftertaste.

name: Château La Dominique Saint-Émilion Grand Cru (Grand Cru Classé) 2014
wine_description: Deep and shiny colour with an intense, characterized nose by seducing aromas of ripe fruits and subtle spicy notes. In most vintages, you will find truffle and licorice notes, complemented by peppery and woody aromas. Fleshy and round, with silky and precise tannins. The finish is long and full and leaves you with a pleasant feeling of bliss.

name: Cesari Bosan Amarone della Valpolicella 2008
wine_description: The characteristic fragrance of cherry merges with hints of spices, cocoa and vanilla. With a full and velvety flavour, it displays all its power in a warm, elegant body. Excellent with game, grilled meats and stews, however we recommend it also by itself, as the ideal meditation wine.

name: Château l'Évangile Pomerol 2004
wine_description: Deep, dark colour with hints of violet. Very fruity nose with dark berries (Morello cherries, blackcurrants) and fresh notes of mocha and toast. On the palate, the attack is refined and silky, with a powerful, balanced tannic structure. The texture is dense and very velvety thanks to the ripe, well-coated tannins. The finish is long with fruity notes, but is dominated by the quality of the tannins.

name: Château Ormes de Pez Saint-Estèphe 2013
wine_description: Dark red violet in colour. On the nose ripe currant, red berry and herbal notes. A tasty, herbaceous, berry and cassis palate with a medium finish.

name: Finca Bacara 3015 Monastrell Ecológico 2015
wine_description: Intense and bright purple red color. In nose we appreciate floral aromas and pleasant nuances of red and black fruit. Elegant in character, very well integrated tannins, soft and ripe.

name: Feudi di San Gregorio Lacryma Christi Rosso 2018
wine_description:
Ruby red color. The nose hints of red fruit freshly picked. In the mouth you hear
freshness and softness, with pleasant fund fresh berries and a sweet tannin.

name: Château Léoville Las Cases Le Petit Lion Saint-Julien 2010
Donnafugata Sedàra 2017
wine_description: A fresh and appealing red wine, it offers a fragrant bouquet with intense aromas of red pulp fruits, especially cherries, and flowery notes of roses. The nose is perfectly reflected in the mouth, enlivened by a spicy note and fresh acidity.

name: Château Mourgues du Grès Galets Rouges Costières-de-Nîmes 2017
wine_description: Deep purplish and which affirms its intensity and generous black fruit with cassis, blackberry and blueberry enriched with spices and cocoa. The tannins are melted in the harmony of the wine where red fruit and licorice and violet

name: Château Grand Corbin-Despagne Saint-Émilion Grand Cru (Grand Cru Classé) 2014
Château Faugères Saint-Émilion Grand Cru (Grand Cru Classé) 2015
Château La Pointe Pomerol 2015
wine_description: The colour is dense, with dark purple tints. Aromas of violet and small forest fruit gently appear. They are followed by cedar, black spices and sandalwood. The palate is smooth and creamy, yet not at all heavy ; beautifully fresh and well-balanced. The length is impressive, caressing and voluptuous with an inviting, mouth-watering finish.

name: Remelluri Lindes de Remelluri Viñedos de San Vicente 2015
wine_name: Lindes de Remelluri Viñedos de San Vicente

name: Château Léoville Poyferré Château Moulin Riche Saint-Julien 2012
Château Haut-Brion Le Clarence de Haut Brion Pessac-Léognan (Château Bahans Haut-Brion) 2010
wine_name: Le Clarence de Haut Brion Pessac-Léognan (Château Bahans Haut-Brion)

name: Cloudy Bay Pinot Noir 2017
wine_description: Intensely fragrant with alluring aromas of dark plums and lifted hints of blueberry, layered over spicy sandalwood and smoky bacon. The palate is succulent and flavoursome with dark fruits and toasty oak gently supported by plush tannins.

name: Marqués de Riscal Rioja Gran Reserva 2013
wine_description: Deep black-cherry colour, almost opaque. Very elegant, complex nose, with aromas of black fruit and lots of spice. It is smooth and round in the mouth, with tannins which are firm, yet silky and very sweet and which envelop the whole palate. The finish is long, lingering, fresh and balanced  with a hint of fine elegant tannins.

name: Fattoria le Pupille Poggio Valente 2015
wine_description: It has an intense ruby red colour with orange reflections which denote the evolution of Sangiovese throughout the years.

name: Château Léoville Las Cases Le Petit Lion Saint-Julien 2009
Château Meyney Saint-Estèphe 2013
wine_description: Shows notes of leather and musk after a period of time. It is full-bodied, well-rounded and structured. After ageing, the wine displays the remarkable charm of the best Saint-Estèphe: complexity, balance and harmony.

name: Château Corbin Saint-Émilion Grand Cru (Grand Cru Classé) 2011
Château La Conseillante Pomerol 2009
wine_description: Very fine, round, very fruity wine, which will provide great tasting pleasure even when young. It is very well balanced and shows lovely freshness, underpinned by a medium structure.

name: Château Lilian Ladouys Saint-Estèphe 2008
wine_description: It is soft and velvety, with blueberry and blackberry aromas. Full body, with round tannins and a long finish. A rich and almost jammy wine.

name: Domaine William Fèvre Chablis Premier Cru Vaillons 2013
wine_description: It has very pronounced floral and fruit driven bouquet, with lovely freshness and a few mineral notes. Full-bodied palate, with lovely roundness.

name: Mas Doix Les Crestes Priorat 2017
wine_description: Potent, mineral-accented dark berry and violet scents, with suggestions of woodsmoke and spicecake emerging slowly. The sweet and penetrating palate offers juicy blueberry and cherry pie flavors, along with an enlivening, zesty acidity. Rich yet stylistically vibrant.

name: Château Peyrabon Château La Fleur Peyrabon Pauillac 2012
Banfi Fonte Alla Selva Chianti Classico 2013
wine_description:
Color: deep red purple. 
Nose: varietal aromas of cherry, plum and blackberry, enriched by notes more 
complex of licorice. 
Taste: large and ripe, balanced by good acidity. 
Good persistence.

name: Château Puygueraud Francs - Côtes de Bordeaux 2010
Clos Rene Pomerol 2014
wine_description: It is a rich and complex wine with notes of coffee, caramel, smoke, violets and black currants. It has firm, silky tannins and it is well balanced.

name: Château Léoville Barton Saint-Julien (Grand Cru Classé) 2015
wine_description: This wine has an opaque dark red violet colour. With lovely herbal, lavender and blackberry notes on the nose. Tart berry, blackberry, black fruit palate with depth and sweet tannins.

name: Château Maucaillou Moulis-en-Médoc 2016
wine_description: It is generally sumptuous in colour, with a particularly subtle and pleasantly fruity aromatic strength, very ripe and concentrated flavours. It is harmoniously balanced, expressive and generous, with finesse and elegance. It has a great length on the palate, with a lively appeal and remarkable cellaring potential thanks to very fine, yet clearly present, tannins.

name: Château Duhart-Milon Pauillac (Grand Cru Classé) 2001
wine_description: Dark with good concentration, and the nose has a tightly defined fruit character, reticent rather than open, with a light sprinkle of chalk over some floral, black fruits. The palate has a very polished style, with a shell of fruit sitting around a core of very firm tannins which, although a strong component of the blend, do not over-ride the other elements.

name: Château de la Dauphine Fronsac 2011
wine_description: Deep scarlet red in colour. Developed on the nose with elegant aromas of undergrowth and fresh truffle. Full and mellow on the palate, with well-integrated silky tannins. A pleasant freshness on the finish, with a hint of liquorice. A well-balanced and fully developed wine with all the elegance and complexity.

name: Cloudy Bay Pinot Noir 2017
wine_description: Intensely fragrant with alluring aromas of dark plums and lifted hints of blueberry, layered over spicy sandalwood and smoky bacon. The palate is succulent and flavoursome with dark fruits and toasty oak gently supported by plush tannins.

name: Marqués de Riscal Rioja Gran Reserva 2013
wine_description: Deep black-cherry colour, almost opaque. Very elegant, complex nose, with aromas of black fruit and lots of spice. wine_description: Deep black-cherry colour, almost opaque. Very elegant, complex nose, with aromas of black fruit and lots of spice. It is smooth and round in the mouth, with tannins which are firm, yet silky and very sweet and which envelop the whole palate. The finish is long, lingering, fresh and balanced  with a hint of fine elegant tannins.

name: Fattoria le Pupille Poggio Valente 2015
wine_description: It has an intense ruby red colour with orange reflections which denote the evolution of Sangiovese throughout the years.

name: Domaine William Fèvre Chablis Premier Cru Vaillons 2013
wine_description: It has very pronounced floral and fruit driven bouquet, with lovely freshness and a few mineral notes. Full-bodied palate, with lovely roundness.

name: Château Meyney Saint-Estèphe 2013
wine_description: Shows notes of leather and musk after a period of time. It is full-bodied, well-rounded and structured. After ageing, the wine displays the remarkable charm of the best Saint-Estèphe: complexity, balance and harmony.

name: Château Corbin Saint-Émilion Grand Cru (Grand Cru Classé) 2011
Château La Conseillante Pomerol 2009
wine_description: Very fine, round, very fruity wine, which will provide great tasting pleasure even when young. It is very well balanced and shows lovely freshness, underpinned by a medium structure.

name: Château Lilian Ladouys Saint-Estèphe 2008
wine_description: It is soft and velvety, with blueberry and blackberry aromas. Full body, with round tannins and a long finish. A rich and almost jammy wine.

name: Château Léoville Las Cases Le Petit Lion Saint-Julien 2009
Mas Doix Les Crestes Priorat 2017
wine_description: Potent, mineral-accented dark berry and violet scents, with suggestions of woodsmoke and spicecake emerging slowly. The sweet and penetrating palate offers juicy blueberry and cherry pie flavors, along with an enlivening, zesty acidity. Rich yet stylistically vibrant.

name: Cloudy Bay Pinot Noir 2017
wine_description: Intensely fragrant with alluring aromas of dark plums and lifted hints of blueberry, layered over spicy sandalwood and smoky bacon. The palate is succulent and flavoursome with dark fruits and toasty oak gently supported by plush tannins.

name: Marqués de Riscal Rioja Gran Reserva 2013
wine_description: Deep black-cherry colour, almost opaque. Very elegant, complex nose, with aromas of black fruit and lots of spice. It is smooth and round in the mouth, with tannins which are firm, yet silky and very sweet and which envelop the whole palate. The finish is long, lingering, fresh and balanced  with a hint of fine elegant tannins.

name: Fattoria le Pupille Poggio Valente 2015
wine_description: It has an intense ruby red colour with orange reflections which denote the evolution of Sangiovese throughout the years.

name: Château Léoville Las Cases Le Petit Lion Saint-Julien 2009
Château Meyney Saint-Estèphe 2013
wine_description: Shows notes of leather and musk after a period of time. It is full-bodied, well-rounded and structured. After ageing, the wine displays the remarkable charm of the best Saint-Estèphe: complexity, balance and harmony.

name: Château Corbin Saint-Émilion Grand Cru (Grand Cru Classé) 2011
Château La Conseillante Pomerol 2009
wine_description: Very fine, round, very fruity wine, which will provide great tasting pleasure even when young. It is very well balanced and shows lovely freshness, underpinned by a medium structure.

name: Château Lilian Ladouys Saint-Estèphe 2008
wine_description: It is soft and velvety, with blueberry and blackberry aromas. Full body, with round tannins and a long finish. A rich and almost jammy wine.

name: Domaine William Fèvre Chablis Premier Cru Vaillons 2013
wine_description: It has very pronounced floral and fruit driven bouquet, with lovely freshness and a few mineral notes. Full-bodied palate, with lovely roundness.

name: Mas Doix Les Crestes Priorat 2017
wine_description: Potent, mineral-accented dark berry and violet scents, with suggestions of woodsmoke and spicecake emerging slowly. The sweet and penetrating palate offers juicy blueberry and cherry pie flavors, along with an enlivening, zesty acidity. Rich yet stylistically vibrant.

name: Château Peyrabon Château La Fleur Peyrabon Pauillac 2012
Banfi Fonte Alla Selva Chianti Classico 2013
wine_description:
Color: deep red purple. 
Nose: varietal aromas of cherry, plum and blackberry, enriched by notes more 
complex of licorice. 
Taste: large and ripe, balanced by good acidity. 
Good persistence.

name: Château Puygueraud Francs - Côtes de Bordeaux 2010
Clos Rene Pomerol 2014
wine_description: It is a rich and complex wine with notes of coffee, caramel, smoke, violets and black currants. It has firm, silky tannins and it is well balanced.

name: Château Léoville Barton Saint-Julien (Grand Cru Classé) 2015
wine_description: This wine has an opaque dark red violet colour. With lovely herbal, lavender and blackberry notes on the nose. Tart berry, blackberry, black fruit palate with depth and sweet tannins.

name: Château Maucaillou Moulis-en-Médoc 2016
wine_description: It is generally sumptuous in colour, with a particularly subtle and pleasantly fruity aromatic strength, very ripe and concentrated flavours. It is harmoniously balanced, expressive and generous, with finesse and elegance. It has a great length on the palate, with a lively appeal and remarkable cellaring potential thanks to very fine, yet clearly present, tannins.

name: Château Duhart-Milon Pauillac (Grand Cru Classé) 2001
wine_description: Dark with good concentration, and the nose has a tightly defined fruit character, reticent rather than open, with a light sprinkle of chalk over some floral, black fruits. The palate has a very polished style, with a shell of fruit sitting around a core of very firm tannins which, although a strong component of the blend, do not over-ride the other elements.

A pleasant freshness on the finish, with a hint of liquorice. A well-balanced and fully developed wine with all the elegance and complexity.

name: Cloudy Bay Pinot Noir 2017
wine_description: Intensely fragrant with alluring aromas of dark plums and lifted hints of blueberry, layered over spicy sandalwood and smoky bacon. The palate is succulent and flavoursome with dark fruits and toasty oak gently supported by plush tannins.

name: Marqués de Riscal Rioja Gran Reserva 2013
wine_description: Deep black-cherry colour, almost opaque. Very elegant, complex nose, with aromas of black fruit and lots of spice. It is smooth and round in the mouth, with tannins which are firm, yet silky and very sweet and which envelop the whole palate. The finish is long, lingering, fresh and balanced  with a hint of fine elegant tannins.

name: Fattoria le Pupille Poggio Valente 2015
wine_description: It has an intense ruby red colour with orange reflections which denote the evolution of Sangiovese throughout the years.

name: Château Léoville Las Cases Le Petit Lion Saint-Julien 2009
Château Meyney Saint-Estèphe 2013
wine_description: Shows notes of leather and musk after a period of time. It is full-bodied, well-rounded and structured. After ageing, the wine displays the remarkable charm of the best Saint-Estèphe: complexity, balance and harmony.

name: Château Corbin Saint-Émilion Grand Cru (Grand Cru Classé) 2011
Château La Conseillante Pomerol 2009
wine_description: Very fine, round, very fruity wine, which will provide great tasting pleasure even when young. It is very well balanced and shows lovely freshness, underpinned by a medium structure.

name: Château Lilian Ladouys Saint-Estèphe 2008
wine_description: It is soft and velvety, with blueberry and blackberry aromas. Full body, with round tannins and a long finish. A rich and almost jammy wine.

name: Domaine William Fèvre Chablis Premier Cru Vaillons 2013
wine_description: It has very pronounced floral and fruit driven bouquet, with lovely freshness and a few mineral notes. Full-bodied palate, with lovely roundness.

name: Mas Doix Les Crestes Priorat 2017
wine_description: Potent, mineral-accented dark berry and violet scents, with suggestions of woodsmoke and spicecake emerging slowly. The sweet and penetrating palate offers juicy blueberry and cherry pie flavors, along with an enlivening, zesty acidity. Rich yet stylistically vibrant.

name: Château Peyrabon Château La Fleur Peyrabon Pauillac 2012
Banfi Fonte Alla Selva Chianti Classico 2013
wine_description:
Color: deep red purple. 
Nose: varietal aromas of cherry, plum and blackberry, enriched by notes more 
complex of licorice. 
Taste: large and ripe, balanced by good acidity. 
Good persistence.

name: Château Puygueraud Francs - Côtes de Bordeaux 2010
Clos Rene Pomerol 2014
wine_description: It is a rich and complex wine with notes of coffee, caramel, smoke, violets and black currants. It has firm, silky tannins and it is well balanced.

name: Château Léoville Barton Saint-Julien (Grand Cru Classé) 2015
wine_description: This wine has an opaque dark red violet colour. With lovely herbal, lavender and blackberry notes on the nose. Tart berry, blackberry, black fruit palate with depth and sweet tannins.

name: Château Maucaillou Moulis-en-Médoc 2016
wine_description: It is generally sumptuous in colour, with a particularly subtle and pleasantly fruity aromatic strength, very ripe and concentrated flavours. It is harmoniously balanced, expressive and generous, with finesse and elegance. It has a great length on the palate, with a lively appeal and remarkable cellaring potential thanks to very fine, yet clearly present, tannins.

name: Château Duhart-Milon Pauillac (Grand Cru Classé) 2001
wine_description: Dark with good concentration, and the nose has a tightly defined fruit character, reticent rather than open, with a light sprinkle of chalk over some floral, black fruits. The palate has a very polished style, with a shell of fruit sitting around a core of very firm tannins which, although a strong component of the blend, do not over-ride the other elements.

The palate has a very polished style, with a shell of fruit sitting around a core of very firm tannins which, although a strong component of the blend, do not over-ride the other elements.

name: Château de la Dauphine Fronsac 2011
wine_description: Deep scarlet red in colour. Developed on the nose with elegant aromas of undergrowth and fresh truffle. Full and mellow on the palate, with well-integrated silky tannins. A pleasant freshness on the finish, with a hint of liquorice. A well-balanced and fully developed wine with all the elegance and complexity.

name: Cloudy Bay Pinot Noir 2017
wine_description: Intensely fragrant with alluring aromas of dark plums and lifted hints of blueberry, layered over spicy sandalwood and smoky bacon. The palate is succulent and flavoursome with dark fruits and toasty oak gently supported by plush tannins.

name: Marqués de Riscal Rioja Gran Reserva 2013
wine_description: Deep black-cherry colour, almost opaque. Very elegant, complex nose, with aromas of black fruit and lots of spice. It is smooth and round in the mouth, with tannins which are firm, yet silky and very sweet and which envelop the whole palate. The finish is long, lingering, fresh and balanced  with a hint of fine elegant tannins.

name: Fattoria le Pupille Poggio Valente 2015
wine_description: It has an intense ruby red colour with orange reflections which denote the evolution of Sangiovese throughout the years.

name: Domaine William Fèvre Chablis Premier Cru Vaillons 2013
wine_description: It has very pronounced floral and fruit driven bouquet, with lovely freshness and a few mineral notes. Full-bodied palate, with lovely roundness.

name: Château Meyney Saint-Estèphe 2013
wine_description: Shows notes of leather and musk after a period of time. It is full-bodied, well-rounded and structured. After ageing, the wine displays the remarkable charm of the best Saint-Estèphe: complexity, balance and harmony.

name: Château Corbin Saint-Émilion Grand Cru (Grand Cru Classé) 2011
Château La Conseillante Pomerol 2009
wine_description: Very fine, round, very fruity wine, which will provide great tasting pleasure even when young. It is very well balanced and shows lovely freshness, underpinned by a medium structure.

name: Château Lilian Ladouys Saint-Estèphe 2008
wine_description: It is soft and velvety, with blueberry and blackberry aromas. Full body, with round tannins and a long finish. A rich and almost jammy wine.

name: Château Léoville Las Cases Le Petit Lion Saint-Julien 2009
Mas Doix Les Crestes Priorat 2017
wine_description: Potent, mineral-accented dark berry and violet scents, with suggestions of woodsmoke and spicecake emerging slowly. The sweet and penetrating palate offers juicy blueberry and cherry pie flavors, along with an enlivening, zesty acidity. Rich yet stylistically vibrant.

name: Château Peyrabon Château La Fleur Peyrabon Pauillac 2012
Banfi Fonte Alla Selva Chianti Classico 2013
wine_description:
Color: deep red purple. 
Nose: varietal aromas of cherry, plum and blackberry, enriched by notes more 
complex of licorice. 
Taste: large and ripe, balanced by good acidity. 
Good persistence.

name: Château Puygueraud Francs - Côtes de Bordeaux 2010
Clos Rene Pomerol 2014
wine_description: It is a rich and complex wine with notes of coffee, caramel, smoke, violets and black currants. It has firm, silky tannins and it is well balanced.

name: Château Léoville Barton Saint-Julien (Grand Cru Classé) 2015
wine_description: This wine has an opaque dark red violet colour. With lovely herbal, lavender and blackberry notes on the nose. Tart berry, blackberry, black fruit palate with depth and sweet tannins.

name: Château Maucaillou Moulis-en-Médoc 2016
wine_description: It is generally sumptuous in colour, with a particularly subtle and pleasantly fruity aromatic strength, very ripe and concentrated flavours. It is harmoniously balanced, expressive and generous, with finesse and elegance. It has a great length on the palate, with a lively appeal and remarkable cellaring potential thanks to very fine, yet clearly present, tannins.

The palate has a very polished style, with a shell of fruit sitting around a core of very firm tannins which, although a strong component of the blend, do not over-ride the other elements.

name: Château de la Dauphine Fronsac 2011
wine_description: Deep scarlet red in colour. Developed on the nose with elegant aromas of undergrowth and fresh truffle. Full and mellow on the palate, with well-integrated silky tannins. A pleasant freshness on the finish, with a hint of liquorice. A well-balanced and fully developed wine with all the elegance and complexity.

name: Marqués de Riscal Rioja Gran Reserva 2013
wine_description: Deep black-cherry colour, almost opaque. Very elegant, complex nose, with aromas of black fruit and lots of spice. It is smooth and round in the mouth, with tannins which are firm, yet silky and very sweet and which envelop the whole palate. The finish is long, lingering, fresh and balanced  with a hint of fine elegant tannins.

name: Mas Doix Les Crestes Priorat 2017
wine_description: Potent, mineral-accented dark berry and violet scents, with suggestions of woodsmoke and spicecake emerging slowly. The sweet and penetrating palate offers juicy blueberry and cherry pie flavors, along with an enlivening, zesty acidity. Rich yet stylistically vibrant.

name: Château Léoville Las Cases Le Petit Lion Saint-Julien 2009
Château Meyney Saint-Estèphe 2013
wine_description: Shows notes of leather and musk after a period of time. It is full-bodied, well-rounded and structured. After ageing, the wine displays the remarkable charm of the best Saint-Estèphe: complexity, balance and harmony.

name: Château Corbin Saint-Émilion Grand Cru (Grand Cru Classé) 2011
Château La Conseillante Pomerol 2009
wine_description: Very fine, round, very fruity wine, which will provide great tasting pleasure even when young. It is very well balanced and shows lovely freshness, underpinned by a medium structure.

name: Château Lilian Ladouys Saint-Estèphe 2008
wine_description: It is soft and velvety, with blueberry and blackberry aromas. Full body, with round tannins and a long finish. A rich and almost jammy wine.

name: Domaine William Fèvre Chablis Premier Cru Vaillons 2013
wine_description: It has very pronounced floral and fruit driven bouquet, with lovely freshness and a few mineral notes. Full-bodied palate, with lovely roundness.

name: Fattoria le Pupille Poggio Valente 2015
wine_description: It has an intense ruby red colour with orange reflections which denote the evolution of Sangiovese throughout the years.

name: Château Peyrabon Château La Fleur Peyrabon Pauillac 2012
Banfi Fonte Alla Selva Chianti Classico 2013
wine_description:
Color: deep red purple. 
Nose: varietal aromas of cherry, plum and blackberry, enriched by notes more 
complex of licorice. 
Taste: large and ripe, balanced by good acidity. 
Good persistence.

name: Château Puygueraud Francs - Côtes de Bordeaux 2010
Clos Rene Pomerol 2014
wine_description: It is a rich and complex wine with notes of coffee, caramel, smoke, violets and black currants. It has firm, silky tannins and it is well balanced.

name: Château Léoville Barton Saint-Julien (Grand Cru Classé) 2015
wine_description: This wine has an opaque dark red violet colour. With lovely herbal, lavender and blackberry notes on the nose. Tart berry, blackberry, black fruit palate with depth and sweet tannins.

name: Château Maucaillou Moulis-en-Médoc 2016
wine_description: It is generally sumptuous in colour, with a particularly subtle and pleasantly fruity aromatic strength, very ripe and concentrated flavours. It is harmoniously balanced, expressive and generous, with finesse and elegance. It has a great length on the palate, with a lively appeal and remarkable cellaring potential thanks to very fine, yet clearly present, tannins.

name: Château Duhart-Milon Pauillac (Grand Cru Classé) 2001

A pleasant freshness on the finish, with a hint of liquorice. A well-balanced and fully developed wine with all the elegance and complexity.

name: Cloudy Bay Pinot Noir 2017
wine_description: Intensely fragrant with alluring aromas of dark plums and lifted hints of blueberry, layered over spicy sandalwood and smoky bacon. The palate is succulent and flavoursome with dark fruits and toasty oak gently supported by plush tannins.
